troy_main_anc_weapon_iron_ash_club.colourText: This wooden cudgel, which strikes as strong as iron, is good for two things: deflecting missiles and crushing heads.
troy_main_anc_weapon_iron_ash_club.localisedColourText: 这根木棒如铁一般坚固，它有两个作用：挡开箭矢，击碎头骨。
troy_main_anc_weapon_iron_ash_club.effect: +2 to motivation|+60 to melee damage of Hero

troy_main_anc_mount_odysseus_bow_spec_su.colourText: This large, slow chariot can carry a greater number of arrows for the Hero to fire at the enemy than is usual.
troy_main_anc_mount_odysseus_bow_spec_su.localisedColourText: 这辆庞大、缓慢的战车能够为英雄提供更多的箭矢，供英雄向敌人射击。

troy_main_anc_item_circe_salve.colourText: This ointment was concocted by the enchantress Circe makes her favoured heroes both stronger against attack and more beautiful to behold.
troy_main_anc_item_circe_salve.localisedColourText: 这罐药膏由魔女喀耳刻调制，能让被她喜欢的英雄变得更加强壮，更加英俊。
troy_main_anc_item_circe_salve.effect: +5% to damage resistance of own units|+3% to hitpoints of Hero
troy_main_anc_item_circe_salve.localisedEffect: 己方部队伤害减免+5%|英雄生命值+3%

troy_main_anc_item_white_granite_ring.colourText: Like the rock from which it is hewn, the wearer of this ring shall be an immovable force, never giving ground or quarter.
troy_main_anc_item_white_granite_ring.localisedColourText: 佩此戒者将如其材石一般，永不动摇、绝不屈服。

troy_main_anc_item_menelaus_belt.colourText: The Spartan king's war belt is strengthened with a band of ornate bronze.
troy_main_anc_item_menelaus_belt.localisedColourText: 斯巴达国王的战争腰带用华丽的青铜带加固。
troy_main_anc_item_menelaus_belt.effect: +7% to morale of axe units in Hero's army|"Blessed Leaders" ability: -2 turns to recovery time of Heroes when wounded
troy_main_anc_item_menelaus_belt.localisedEffect: 英雄所在军队中持斧部队士气+7%|“天佑领袖”能力：英雄受伤后恢复回合数-2

troy_adi_anc_item_salamian_clapper.colourText: "Ring the giants' bell! Let its toll rise to the heavens and rattle the halls of Olympus!"
troy_adi_anc_item_salamian_clapper.localisedColourText: “敲响巨人的钟！让钟声上达天穹，在奥林匹斯的殿堂中回荡！”

troy_main_anc_mount_fighter_balanced_mel.colourText: This medium-weight chariot enables the Hero to stay close to the fray whilst throwing their javelins at the foe.
troy_main_anc_mount_fighter_balanced_mel.localisedColourText: 这辆中等重量的战车可载着英雄在近距离向敌人投掷标枪。

troy_main_anc_item_tusks_calydonian.colourText: These giant tusks were gifted to the exalted hunter upon his slaying of the sacred boar.
troy_main_anc_item_tusks_calydonian.localisedColourText: 这些巨大的獠牙是送给那位高贵的猎人的，因为他杀死了神圣的野猪。
troy_main_anc_item_tusks_calydonian.effect: -2 to siege holdout time (minimum 1 turn)|+10 to diplomatic relations with the Danaans (Achaeans, Aeolians, Dorians, Ionians)
troy_main_anc_item_tusks_calydonian.localisedEffect: 围城坚持时间-2（至少1回合）|与达南人（亚该亚人、伊奥利亚人、多里安人、爱奥尼亚人）的外交关系+10

troy_main_anc_item_ivory_lyre.colourText: "It's almost too nice to spoil by playing, but a great beast gave its life, so by rights I must."
troy_main_anc_item_ivory_lyre.localisedColourText: “这样的乐器拿来演奏真有点焚琴烹鹤，但是一只巨兽为此献出了生命，所以我得珍惜。”
troy_main_anc_item_ivory_lyre.effect: -8% to success chance of enemy agent actions against this agent
troy_main_anc_item_ivory_lyre.localisedEffect: 敌方事务官针对该事务官的行动成功率-8%

troy_main_anc_mount_archer_skirmisher_bo.colourText: This very fast, very light chariot is the perfect platform from which the Hero can shoot the enemy dead in their tracks.
troy_main_anc_mount_archer_skirmisher_bo.localisedColourText: 这辆轻便快捷的战车是英雄射杀敌人的完美平台。

troy_main_anc_item_dorian_kithon.colourText: This linen or wool cloak, made from a single rectangle of cloth, is worn draped across the body and is fastened at the shoulder with a pin or clasp.
troy_main_anc_item_dorian_kithon.localisedColourText: 斗篷通常是由一整块亚麻布或羊毛制成，穿戴时垂下来遮盖住全身，并在肩膀处用别针或扣子固定。

troy_main_anc_weapon_heracles_sword.colourText: This mighty blade, a gift from Hermes to the greatest hero, strikes and kills with divine ease.
troy_main_anc_weapon_heracles_sword.localisedColourText: 这把强大的剑是赫耳墨斯送给最伟大英雄的礼物，可以轻易斩杀敌人。
troy_main_anc_weapon_heracles_sword.effect: +70 to melee damage of Hero|+10% to morale for mythic, mounted and chariot units
troy_main_anc_weapon_heracles_sword.localisedEffect: 英雄近战杀伤+70|神话、骑乘及战车部队士气+10%

troy_main_anc_item_golden_diploma.colourText: This golden tablet was bestowed on this truly great soldier for their many achievements on campaign in service of the state.
troy_main_anc_item_golden_diploma.localisedColourText: 这块金板用来表彰这位为国家立下无数战功的英勇战士。

troy_main_anc_armour_capaneus_shield.colourText: Bearing the image of a naked warrior carrying a blazing torch, the second tribe leader's shield is a defensive bastion for his loyal warriors.
troy_main_anc_armour_capaneus_shield.localisedColourText: 第二位部落首领的盾牌上画着一名手持燃烧火炬的裸体战士，这面盾牌保护着他忠诚的战士们。
troy_main_anc_armour_capaneus_shield.effect: +2 to motivation|+4 to melee defence of Hero

troy_main_anc_mount_warlord_tactician_ja.colourText: This medium-weight chariot enables the Hero to stay close to the fray whilst throwing their javelins at the foe.
troy_main_anc_mount_warlord_tactician_ja.localisedColourText: 这辆中等重量的战车可载着英雄在近距离向敌人投掷标枪。

troy_main_anc_armour_penthesilea_helm.colourText: This full-face helmet conceals the Thracian warrior's great beauty in battle, ensuring her challenges always result in a fair fight.
troy_main_anc_armour_penthesilea_helm.localisedColourText: 这顶头盔保护整个面部，隐藏了这位色雷斯战士俊美的面容，让她能如愿以偿地和敌人公平战斗。
troy_main_anc_armour_penthesilea_helm.effect: +10% to morale of all units when attacking|+3 to melee defence of Hero
troy_main_anc_armour_penthesilea_helm.localisedEffect: 进攻时所有部队士气+10%|英雄近战防御+3

troy_main_anc_item_ionian_chlamys.colourText: This lightweight cape is ideal for avoiding sunburn in the punishing daytime heat, enabling daily life to continue relatively unhindered by the climate.
troy_main_anc_item_ionian_chlamys.localisedColourText: 这身轻便的斗篷很适合在酷热的天气里用来遮阳，以便减少气候对人们生活的影响。
troy_main_anc_item_ionian_chlamys.effect: +3 to happiness in the local province

troy_main_anc_item_white_granite_mosaic.colourText: That something so beautiful could come from something so hard and strong gives hope that peace will reign here once again.
troy_main_anc_item_white_granite_mosaic.localisedColourText: 如此美丽之物塑自如此坚硬之材，给人们带来了和平将会再次降临的希望。
troy_main_anc_item_white_granite_mosaic.effect: +3 to happiness in the local province| +1 to motivation

troy_main_anc_item_lelegan_chlamys.colourText: This lightweight cape is ideal for avoiding sunburn in the punishing daytime heat, enabling daily life to continue relatively unhindered by the climate.
troy_main_anc_item_lelegan_chlamys.localisedColourText: 这身轻便的斗篷很适合在酷热的天气里用来遮阳，以便减少气候对人们生活的影响。
troy_main_anc_item_lelegan_chlamys.effect: +3 to happiness in the local province

troy_main_anc_mount_aeneas_melee.colourText: This most sturdy, well-made heavy chariot is capable of bearing the Hero into combat and breaking through the toughest frontline with relative ease.
troy_main_anc_mount_aeneas_melee.localisedColourText: 这辆制作精良的重型战车坚固无比，能够载着英雄进入战斗，并轻易突破最稳固的阵线。

troy_main_anc_follower_skilled_administr.colourText: This man is responsible for running the day-to-day logistics of running the army.
troy_main_anc_follower_skilled_administr.localisedColourText: 此人负责军队每日的补给调度。
troy_main_anc_follower_skilled_administr.effect: -1 to siege holdout time (minimum 1 turn)|-8% to upkeep cost of all units in Hero's army
troy_main_anc_follower_skilled_administr.localisedEffect: 围城坚持时间-1（至少1回合）|英雄所在军队内所有部队维护费-8%

troy_main_anc_mount_spa_menelaus_melee_s.colourText: This extremely-heavy chariot is best used for punching through battle lines while the Hero it bears uses their spear two-handed to cut the enemy down.
troy_main_anc_mount_spa_menelaus_melee_s.localisedColourText: 这辆极重的战车最适合冲锋陷阵，车上的英雄能够双手挥舞长矛斩杀敌人。

troy_dlc1_anc_mount_hip_hero_archer_tric.colourText: This large, slow chariot can carry a greater number of arrows for the Hero to fire at the enemy than is usual.
troy_dlc1_anc_mount_hip_hero_archer_tric.localisedColourText: 这辆庞大、缓慢的战车能够为英雄提供更多的箭矢，供英雄向敌人射击。

troy_main_anc_weapon_diomedes_spear.colourText: A bullish weapon for a bull of a man, which when thrown with ferocity can even harm the gods themselves.
troy_main_anc_weapon_diomedes_spear.localisedColourText: 这是供健壮人类使用的一件凶器，用力投掷出去，强大的威力甚至能够杀伤众神。
troy_main_anc_weapon_diomedes_spear.effect: +8% to morale of spear units in Hero's army|-8% to recruitment cost of spear units
troy_main_anc_weapon_diomedes_spear.localisedEffect: 英雄所在军队中持矛部队士气+8%|持矛部队征募花费-8%

troy_dlc1_anc_mount_pen_hero_fighter_dis.colourText: This most sturdy, well-made heavy chariot is capable of bearing the Hero into combat and breaking through the toughest frontline with relative ease.
troy_dlc1_anc_mount_pen_hero_fighter_dis.localisedColourText: 这辆制作精良的重型战车坚固无比，能够载着英雄进入战斗，并轻易突破最稳固的阵线。

troy_main_anc_item_mountain_mule.colourText: These robust, sturdy breeds are reared on rugged terrain, over which they can move swiftly while bearing heavy loads.
troy_main_anc_item_mountain_mule.localisedColourText: 这些品种健壮无比，在崎岖地带饲养长大，可以在重负下快速前行。
troy_main_anc_item_mountain_mule.effect: +8% to campaign movement range of host army
troy_main_anc_item_mountain_mule.localisedEffect: 己方军队战役地图移动距离+8%

troy_main_anc_follower_army_physician.colourText: "As you might expect, I deal with a lot of corns. Stab wounds are also a speciality of mine."
troy_main_anc_follower_army_physician.localisedColourText: “如你所想，我很擅长处理鸡眼。当然了，刺伤也不在话下。”
troy_main_anc_follower_army_physician.effect: +4% to casualty replenishment rate of all armies

troy_main_anc_follower_hecamede.colourText: Far more than a mere serving woman, Hecamede was taken from Tenedos and sent to King Nestor of Pylos as a hostage, her presence ensuring her father's continued compliance.
troy_main_anc_follower_hecamede.localisedColourText: 赫卡梅德绝不仅仅是个侍女，她来自忒涅多斯，作为人质被派往皮洛斯侍奉涅斯托耳王。这样，她的父亲便不敢轻易背叛了。
troy_main_anc_follower_hecamede.effect: +2 to motivation|+3% to morale of all units in own territory
troy_main_anc_follower_hecamede.localisedEffect: 斗志+2|位于己方领土时，所有部队士气+3%

troy_main_anc_mount_defender_aggro_melee.colourText: This medium-weight chariot enables the Hero to stay close to the fray whilst throwing their javelins at the foe.
troy_main_anc_mount_defender_aggro_melee.localisedColourText: 这辆中等重量的战车可载着英雄在近距离向敌人投掷标枪。

troy_main_anc_mount_defender_aggro_melee.colourText: This extremely-heavy chariot is best used for punching through battle lines while the Hero it bears uses their spear two-handed to cut the enemy down.
troy_main_anc_mount_defender_aggro_melee.localisedColourText: 这辆极重的战车最适合冲锋陷阵，车上的英雄能够双手挥舞长矛斩杀敌人。

troy_main_anc_follower_xenodice.colourText: It’s simple. If the father of Xenodice continues to behave in a sufficiently compliant manner, his daughter will continue to live.
troy_main_anc_follower_xenodice.localisedColourText: 很简单。若是赫诺蒂斯的父亲乐意保持足够的顺从，那他的女儿就没有性命之忧。
troy_main_anc_follower_xenodice.effect: +2 to motivation|+9% to morale of all units in own territory
troy_main_anc_follower_xenodice.localisedEffect: 斗志+2|位于己方领土时，所有部队士气+9%

troy_main_anc_item_seal_ialysos.colourText: Named for the alluring princess of Libya, this great city of the Ionian coast has a reputation for martial heft that attracts great warriors to its gates.
troy_main_anc_item_seal_ialysos.localisedColourText: 这座位于爱奥尼亚海岸的伟大城市以迷人的利比亚公主命名，因尚武而闻名于世，吸引着伟大的战士们。
troy_main_anc_item_seal_ialysos.effect: -20% to recruitment cost of infantry units wielding two-handed weapons|+5 to influence
troy_main_anc_item_seal_ialysos.localisedEffect: 使用双手武器的步兵部队征募花费-20%|影响力+5

troy_dlc1_anc_mount_hip_hippolyta_chario.colourText: This large, slow chariot can carry a greater number of arrows for the Hero to fire at the enemy than is usual.
troy_dlc1_anc_mount_hip_hippolyta_chario.localisedColourText: 这辆庞大、缓慢的战车能够为英雄提供更多的箭矢，供英雄向敌人射击。

troy_main_anc_armour_heavy_helmet.colourText: Sensible headwear for the occasion can help one avoid a splitting headache.
troy_main_anc_armour_heavy_helmet.localisedColourText: 合适的头盔可以让你避免头痛欲“裂”的感觉，这里指物理意义上的裂。
troy_main_anc_armour_heavy_helmet.effect: +2 to motivation|+4 to armour of Hero

troy_adi_anc_follower_tecmessa.colourText: Ajax claimed King Teuthras' beautiful daughter as his wife after he vanquished her treacherous father.
troy_adi_anc_follower_tecmessa.localisedColourText: 埃阿斯在击败了狡猾的特斯拉斯王后，将他美丽的女儿掳走做了妻子。
troy_adi_anc_follower_tecmessa.effect: +20% to morale of own units|+20 to morale of Hero
troy_adi_anc_follower_tecmessa.localisedEffect: 己方部队士气+20%|英雄士气+20

troy_main_anc_item_bronze_lamp.colourText: "Light a flame, in the dark; light a flame, in my heart."
troy_main_anc_item_bronze_lamp.localisedColourText: “你是那夜空最美的光芒，让你的火照亮我心房。”
troy_main_anc_item_bronze_lamp.effect: +15% to line of sight on campaign map

troy_dlc1_anc_mount_hip_hero_balanced_ho.colourText: This powerful mount has been reared for combat from the very beginning, and is unlikely to be spooked in the thick of battle.
troy_dlc1_anc_mount_hip_hero_balanced_ho.localisedColourText: 这匹强壮的坐骑专为战斗而生，在激烈的战场上也不会受到惊吓。

troy_dlc1_anc_mount_pen_hero_warlord_tac.colourText: This most sturdy, well-made heavy chariot is capable of bearing the Hero into combat and breaking through the toughest frontline with relative ease.
troy_dlc1_anc_mount_pen_hero_warlord_tac.localisedColourText: 这辆制作精良的重型战车坚固无比，能够载着英雄进入战斗，并轻易突破最稳固的阵线。

troy_main_anc_item_ariadne_thread.colourText: "I'm running – finding my way back home."
troy_main_anc_item_ariadne_thread.effect: -2 to construction time in province capitals |-15% to stone construction costs
troy_main_anc_item_ariadne_thread.localisedEffect: 行省首府内建造时间-2 |石材建造花费-15%

troy_main_anc_weapon_celestial_iron_dagg.colourText: Forged in the heavens, so a mortal warrior may kill as the gods do.
troy_main_anc_weapon_celestial_iron_dagg.localisedColourText: 此刃锻于天堂，故而持有它的凡人战士能够像神一样杀戮。
troy_main_anc_weapon_celestial_iron_dagg.effect: +1 to motivation|+8 to melee attack of Hero

troy_main_anc_weapon_golden_ritual_dagge.colourText: This one toils before the gods, but unlike the priesthood, their work is to despatch the foe quickly, cleanly, and above all, quietly.
troy_main_anc_weapon_golden_ritual_dagge.localisedColourText: 此人在众神面前辛苦工作，但与祭司不同，他的工作要求迅速、干净，最关键是要安静地除掉敌人。
troy_main_anc_weapon_golden_ritual_dagge.effect: -20% to action cost for all agents

troy_main_anc_armour_hector_armour.colourText: Utilising both plates and scales of bronze, Hector's armour protects his person from slashing, stabbing and indirect arrow-fire.
troy_main_anc_armour_hector_armour.localisedColourText: 赫克托耳的铠甲上有青铜制成的板和鳞片，能够保护他不被剑砍、矛戳和流矢伤害。
troy_main_anc_armour_hector_armour.effect: +4 to armour of Hero|+4 to melee defence of Hero
troy_main_anc_armour_hector_armour.localisedEffect: 英雄护甲+4|英雄近战防御+4

troy_main_anc_item_themiscyran_chalice.colourText: Hippolyta carries this ornamented drinking vessel, looted from the sacred city of Themiscyra, as a memento of the Amazons' successful assault.
troy_main_anc_item_themiscyran_chalice.localisedColourText: 这只华丽的酒杯是从圣城特弥斯库拉掠夺来的战利品，希波吕忒将它作为亚马逊人的战利品带了回去。
troy_main_anc_item_themiscyran_chalice.effect: +20 influence after victory, doubled if battle captives are killed|+2 to happiness in the local province from presence of Heroes
troy_main_anc_item_themiscyran_chalice.localisedEffect: 胜利后获得的影响力+20，选择处决战俘则加倍|该行省满意度（来自当地英雄）+2

troy_main_anc_item_dorian_chlamys.colourText: This lightweight cape is ideal for avoiding sunburn in the punishing daytime heat, enabling daily life to continue relatively unhindered by the climate.
troy_main_anc_item_dorian_chlamys.localisedColourText: 这身轻便的斗篷很适合在酷热的天气里用来遮阳，以便减少气候对人们生活的影响。
troy_main_anc_item_dorian_chlamys.effect: +2 to happiness in the local province

troy_main_anc_armour_parthenopeus_shield.colourText: On the fifth tribe leader's shield is depicted a sphynx clutching a dying Theban in its claws.
troy_main_anc_armour_parthenopeus_shield.localisedColourText: 第五位部落领袖的盾牌上画着斯芬克斯，正用爪子抓着垂死的底比斯人。
troy_main_anc_armour_parthenopeus_shield.effect: +2 to motivation|+5 to melee defence of Hero

troy_main_anc_item_melampus_cure.colourText: The fabled soothsayer could apparently even cure insanity caused by an Olympian curse.
troy_main_anc_item_melampus_cure.localisedColourText: 传说中的预言家甚至可以治愈由奥林匹斯的诅咒引发的疯狂。
troy_main_anc_item_melampus_cure.effect: -20% to attrition from desertion|+5% to casualty replenishment rate of all armies
troy_main_anc_item_melampus_cure.localisedEffect: 逃兵造成的损耗-20%|所有军队补员速率+5%

troy_main_anc_armour_heavy_shield.colourText: Bigger and thicker than average, with this shield you can even barrel your opponent over, then stick them when they're on the ground.
troy_main_anc_armour_heavy_shield.localisedColourText: 这面盾牌比一般的盾牌更大也更重，甚至能用来击倒你的对手，之后把他死死地压在地上。

troy_main_anc_item_ancaeus_bearskin.colourText: When watching and waiting for your prey to make a mistake, sometimes for hours, it's just common sense to stay warm.
troy_main_anc_item_ancaeus_bearskin.localisedColourText: 等待猎物犯错或许需要好几个小时，因此一定要注意做好保暖工作。

troy_dlc1_anc_mount_hip_hero_fighter_dis.colourText: This fast mount is suitable for bearing a skirmisher within range and then expeditiously back to a safe distance.
troy_dlc1_anc_mount_hip_hero_fighter_dis.localisedColourText: 这匹坐骑速度飞快，可以带着突袭者迅速地撤退到安全距离。

troy_main_anc_mount_archer_trickster_bow.colourText: This light chariot will keep the Hero mobile on the battlefield, but is still strong enough to be used as an archery platform.
troy_main_anc_mount_archer_trickster_bow.localisedColourText: 这辆轻型战车将使英雄在战场上保持机动性，并且也足够坚固，可以用作射箭平台。

troy_main_anc_item_white_granite_amulet.colourText: Rarer than some of its relatives, white  granite is sought after and reserved for the greatest among us.
troy_main_anc_item_white_granite_amulet.localisedColourText: 白色花岗岩是同类中的珍品，被伟人们追捧收藏。
troy_main_anc_item_white_granite_amulet.effect: +1 to motivation|+5 to morale of Hero

troy_main_anc_weapon_teucros_bow.colourText: Only the gods' favourites are immune to its arrows.
troy_main_anc_weapon_teucros_bow.localisedColourText: 只有众神的宠儿才不会受到神箭的伤害。
troy_main_anc_weapon_teucros_bow.effect: +2 to motivation|+4% to ammunition of missile units in Hero's army
troy_main_anc_weapon_teucros_bow.localisedEffect: 斗志+2|英雄所在军队远程部队矢石容量+4%

troy_main_anc_armour_aeneas_helmet.colourText: The Trojan hero's bronze helmet is adorned with a distinctive red crest by which his warrior's can easily identify him on the field.
troy_main_anc_armour_aeneas_helmet.localisedColourText: 特洛伊英雄的青铜头盔上装饰着红顶，这样他手下的将士们就能在战场上轻易辨认出他。
troy_main_anc_armour_aeneas_helmet.effect: +3 to armour of Hero|+2 to melee defence of Hero
troy_main_anc_armour_aeneas_helmet.localisedEffect: 英雄护甲+3|英雄近战防御+2

troy_main_anc_mount_balius_xanthus.colourText: Achilles' divine horses were a gift from Lord Poseidon himself.
troy_main_anc_mount_balius_xanthus.localisedColourText: 阿喀琉斯的神马是神王波塞冬赠予他的礼物。
troy_main_anc_mount_balius_xanthus.effect: The Hero gains +14%  speed in battle while on a chariot
troy_main_anc_mount_balius_xanthus.localisedEffect: 英雄乘坐战车时战斗移速+14%

troy_main_anc_armour_meleager_armour.colourText: Armour so shiny that it's seriously off-putting to the enemy, as it was to the famed Argonaut's porcine prey.
troy_main_anc_armour_meleager_armour.localisedColourText: 这盔甲对敌人而言是如此闪耀，就像阿尔戈船英雄狩猎的著名野猪一样。
troy_main_anc_armour_meleager_armour.effect: +4 to armour of Hero|+10% to missile resistance of Hero
troy_main_anc_armour_meleager_armour.localisedEffect: 英雄护甲+4|英雄远程抗性+10%

troy_main_anc_item_maeonian_himation.colourText: Worn over the kithon or peplos tunic, the himation is a heavier garment than other cloaks, for wearing at night or during the winter months.
troy_main_anc_item_maeonian_himation.localisedColourText: 长袍是穿在宽袍或大披肩外面的衣物，比其他的斗篷要重一些，主要适用于夜晚和冬季。
troy_main_anc_item_maeonian_himation.effect: +2 to motivation|+6 to diplomatic relations with the Trojans (Pelasgians, Leleges, Maeonians, Thracians)
troy_main_anc_item_maeonian_himation.localisedEffect: 斗志+2|与特洛伊人（佩拉斯吉人、莱勒格斯人、梅奥尼亚人、色雷斯人）的外交关系+6

troy_main_anc_item_seal_knidos.colourText: The emblem of Knidos' noble ruler works as an assurance of trust to all of its denizens.
troy_main_anc_item_seal_knidos.localisedColourText: 尼多斯的贵族统治者徽章是对全体公民信任的保证。
troy_main_anc_item_seal_knidos.effect: Favour of Aphrodite: +1 per turn|+20% to campaign movement range of Hero's army when at sea|+30 to growth in the local province
troy_main_anc_item_seal_knidos.localisedEffect: 阿佛洛狄忒的眷顾：每回合+1|英雄所在军队海上移动距离+20%|该行省发展+30

troy_dlc1_anc_mount_hip_hippolyta_archer.colourText: This speedy horse will get its rider close enough to the enemy to loose their arrows and then quickly back out of range again.
troy_dlc1_anc_mount_hip_hippolyta_archer.localisedColourText: 这匹快马可以载着骑手快速接近敌人，然后在挽弓放箭后快速拉开距离。

troy_main_anc_follower_cassandra.colourText: Cassandra is one of nineteen daughters of King Priam and his exceptionally fertile wife, Hecuba, and sister to Paris and Hector.
troy_main_anc_follower_cassandra.localisedColourText: 普里阿摩斯多产的妻子赫卡柏为他生育了十九个女儿，卡珊德拉正是其中之一。她是帕里斯和赫克托耳的妹妹。
troy_main_anc_follower_cassandra.effect: -8% to attrition in Hero's army| +2 to motivation|+14 to diplomatic relations with the Trojans (Pelasgians, Leleges, Maeonians, Thracians)
troy_main_anc_follower_cassandra.localisedEffect: 英雄所在军队损耗-8%|斗志+2|与特洛伊人（佩拉斯吉人、莱勒格斯人、梅奥尼亚人、色雷斯人）的外交关系+14

troy_main_anc_item_pelt_calydonian.colourText: This slain boar's fine pelt was part of the prize promised to its killer before the mythical Calydonian Hunt.
troy_main_anc_item_pelt_calydonian.localisedColourText: 这条野猪的精美毛皮是在神秘的卡吕冬大狩猎之前，承诺给狩猎它的猎手的奖励之一。
troy_main_anc_item_pelt_calydonian.effect: +10% to morale of own missile units|-10% to recruitment cost of missile units
troy_main_anc_item_pelt_calydonian.localisedEffect: 己方远程部队士气+10%|远程部队征募花费-10%

troy_dlc1_anc_follower_amazon_priestess.colourText: A mystic woman that carries the traditions of countless Amazon generations.
troy_dlc1_anc_follower_amazon_priestess.localisedColourText: 这名神秘女性对远古的亚马逊传统了如指掌。
troy_dlc1_anc_follower_amazon_priestess.effect: +1 to recruit rank of all units

troy_main_anc_item_cup_nestor.colourText: "Come, let us drink from the cup and be as true-born brothers!"
troy_main_anc_item_cup_nestor.localisedColourText: “来吧，我们同杯饮酒，亲如兄弟！”

troy_main_anc_item_achaean_kithon.colourText: This linen or wool cloak, made from a single rectangle of cloth, is worn draped across the body and is fastened at the shoulder with a pin or clasp.
troy_main_anc_item_achaean_kithon.localisedColourText: 宽袍通常是由一整块亚麻布或羊毛制成，穿戴时垂下来遮盖住全身，并在肩膀处用别针或扣子固定。

troy_main_anc_mount_rhesus_steeds.colourText: The Thracian king's horses were stolen from his camp while he slep by Diomedes and Odysseus, following Rhesus' betrayal by Dolon.
troy_main_anc_mount_rhesus_steeds.localisedColourText: 色雷斯国王瑞索斯遭到多伦的背叛后，在睡觉时被狄俄墨德斯和奥德修斯偷走了帐外的战马。
troy_main_anc_mount_rhesus_steeds.effect: The Hero gains +14%  speed in battle while on a chariot
troy_main_anc_mount_rhesus_steeds.localisedEffect: 英雄乘坐战车时战斗移速+14%

troy_main_anc_mount_defender_aggro_melee.colourText: This most sturdy, well-made heavy chariot is capable of bearing the Hero into combat and breaking through the toughest frontline with relative ease.
troy_main_anc_mount_defender_aggro_melee.localisedColourText: 这辆制作精良的重型战车坚固无比，能够载着英雄进入战斗，并轻易突破最稳固的阵线。

troy_dlc1_anc_mount_pen_hero_fighter_dis.colourText: This large, sturdy, yet swift beast is capable of carrying extra javelins for its skirmishing rider to hurl at the enemy.
troy_dlc1_anc_mount_pen_hero_fighter_dis.localisedColourText: 这只庞大、健壮而又敏捷的猛兽可以携带额外的标枪，供它背上的骑手向敌人投掷。

troy_main_anc_weapon_philoctetes_bow.colourText: "Try to set the night on fire."
troy_main_anc_weapon_philoctetes_bow.effect: +20% to ranged armour-piercing damage of Hero|+25% to missile damage of Hero|+20% to missile range of Hero
troy_main_anc_weapon_philoctetes_bow.localisedEffect: 英雄远程破甲杀伤+20%|英雄远程杀伤+25%|英雄射程+20%

troy_dlc1_anc_mount_pen_hero_warlord_uti.colourText: This fast mount is suitable for bearing a skirmisher within range and then expeditiously back to a safe distance.
troy_dlc1_anc_mount_pen_hero_warlord_uti.localisedColourText: 这匹坐骑速度飞快，可以带着突袭者迅速地撤退到安全距离。

troy_main_anc_item_silver_cup.colourText: "I was given this chalice by the queen, for personally ensuring the king came back in one piece."
troy_main_anc_item_silver_cup.localisedColourText: “我护卫着国王平安归来，于是王后赏给我这个杯子。”

troy_main_anc_mount_defender_tank_melee.colourText: This most sturdy, well-made heavy chariot is capable of bearing the Hero into combat and breaking through the toughest frontline with relative ease.
troy_main_anc_mount_defender_tank_melee.localisedColourText: 这辆制作精良的重型战车坚固无比，能够载着英雄进入战斗，并轻易突破最稳固的阵线。

troy_dlc1_anc_mount_pen_hero_warlord_tac.colourText: This large, sturdy, yet swift beast is capable of carrying extra javelins for its skirmishing rider to hurl at the enemy.
troy_dlc1_anc_mount_pen_hero_warlord_tac.localisedColourText: 这只庞大、健壮而又敏捷的猛兽可以携带额外的标枪，供它背上的骑手向敌人投掷。

troy_main_anc_item_lelegan_kithon.colourText: This linen or wool cloak, made from a single rectangle of cloth, is worn draped across the body and is fastened at the shoulder with a pin or clasp.
troy_main_anc_item_lelegan_kithon.localisedColourText: 斗篷通常是由一整块亚麻布或羊毛制成，穿戴时垂下来遮盖住全身，并在肩膀处用别针或扣子固定。

troy_main_anc_follower_deinome.colourText: Deinome is held captive to ensure the continuation of the good, neighbourly behaviour of her father.
troy_main_anc_follower_deinome.localisedColourText: 为了保证德因厄墨的父亲能保持亲切友好，她被扣为人质。
troy_main_anc_follower_deinome.effect: +2 to motivation|+7% to morale of all units in own territory
troy_main_anc_follower_deinome.localisedEffect: 斗志+2|位于己方领土时，所有部队士气+7%

troy_main_anc_item_pelasgian_himation.colourText: Worn over the kithon or peplos tunic, the himation is a heavier garment than other cloaks, for wearing at night or during the winter months.
troy_main_anc_item_pelasgian_himation.localisedColourText: 长袍是穿在宽袍或大披肩外面的衣物，比其他的斗篷要重一些，主要适用于夜晚和冬季。
troy_main_anc_item_pelasgian_himation.effect: +2 to motivation|+10 to diplomatic relations with the Trojans (Pelasgians, Leleges, Maeonians, Thracians)
troy_main_anc_item_pelasgian_himation.localisedEffect: 斗志+2|与特洛伊人（佩拉斯吉人、莱勒格斯人、梅奥尼亚人、色雷斯人）的外交关系+10

troy_dlc1_anc_mount_pen_hero_warlord_war.colourText: This extremely-heavy chariot is best used for punching through battle lines while the Hero it bears uses their spear two-handed to cut the enemy down.
troy_dlc1_anc_mount_pen_hero_warlord_war.localisedColourText: 这辆极重的战车最适合冲锋陷阵，车上的英雄能够双手挥舞长矛斩杀敌人。

troy_main_anc_mount_paris_bow_support.colourText: This large, slow chariot can carry a greater number of arrows for the Hero to fire at the enemy than is usual.
troy_main_anc_mount_paris_bow_support.localisedColourText: 这辆庞大、缓慢的战车能够为英雄提供更多的箭矢，供英雄向敌人射击。

troy_main_anc_item_tydeus_boarskin.colourText: Diomedes' father, a ferocious warrior in his own right, wore the pelt of a giant boar to battle.
troy_main_anc_item_tydeus_boarskin.localisedColourText: 狄俄墨德斯的父亲也是一名凶猛的战士，他在战斗中身披巨型野猪的毛皮。
troy_main_anc_item_tydeus_boarskin.effect: +2 to motivation|+7% to morale of club units in Hero's army
troy_main_anc_item_tydeus_boarskin.localisedEffect: 斗志+2|该英雄麾下棍棒部队士气+7%

troy_main_anc_weapon_bronze_ritual_dagge.colourText: Made for ritual, repurposed for murder.
troy_main_anc_weapon_bronze_ritual_dagge.localisedColourText: 为仪式而打造，为谋杀而重制。
troy_main_anc_weapon_bronze_ritual_dagge.effect: -10% to action cost for all agents

troy_dlc1_anc_mount_hip_hero_archer_skir.colourText: This large, slow chariot can carry a greater number of arrows for the Hero to fire at the enemy than is usual.
troy_dlc1_anc_mount_hip_hero_archer_skir.localisedColourText: 这辆庞大、缓慢的战车能够为英雄提供更多的箭矢，供英雄向敌人射击。

troy_main_anc_item_gorgon_head.colourText: When a single glance can turn adversaries to stone, secret espionage missions tend to go well.
troy_main_anc_item_gorgon_head.localisedColourText: 要是能用眼神把敌人变成石头，秘密间谍任务就会顺利无比。
troy_main_anc_item_gorgon_head.effect: +5% to success chance of all spy actions

troy_main_anc_armour_zone_belt.colourText: This simple woven belt, designed to secure a chiton, himation or peplos, can be worn by both men and women.
troy_main_anc_armour_zone_belt.localisedColourText: 这条做工简单的编织腰带可以用来束住短袍、长袍或大披肩，无论男女都可以穿戴。
troy_main_anc_armour_zone_belt.effect: +1 to motivation|+4 to morale of Hero

troy_main_anc_item_trojan_palladium.colourText: "Athena Pallas guarantees not only our safety, but our survival also!"
troy_main_anc_item_trojan_palladium.localisedColourText: “雅典娜也叫帕拉斯，她不仅保护了我们的生命安全，也庇护了我们繁荣昌盛！”
troy_main_anc_item_trojan_palladium.effect: -10% to cost of all agent actions|This agent's action points will not be drained if an action fails
troy_main_anc_item_trojan_palladium.localisedEffect: 所有事务官行动花费-10%|该事务官行动失败时不会清空行动点数

troy_dlc1_anc_mount_pen_hero_archer_skir.colourText: This large, slow chariot can carry a greater number of arrows for the Hero to fire at the enemy than is usual.
troy_dlc1_anc_mount_pen_hero_archer_skir.localisedColourText: 这辆庞大、缓慢的战车能够为英雄提供更多的箭矢，供英雄向敌人射击。

troy_main_anc_item_seal_athens.colourText: Athens' seal convinces prospective warriors of its ruler's intentions more than any coin ever could.
troy_main_anc_item_seal_athens.localisedColourText: 雅典的印章比任何财宝都更有说服力，可以确保未来的战士们为统治者效劳。
troy_main_anc_item_seal_athens.effect: Favour of Athena: +3 per turn| +10% to administration efficiency for royal decrees
troy_main_anc_item_seal_athens.localisedEffect: 雅典娜的眷顾：每回合+3|王室法令行政效率+10%

troy_main_anc_item_gorgoneion.colourText: "Stare deep into Medusa's eyes and despair!"
troy_main_anc_item_gorgoneion.localisedColourText: “看着美杜莎的眼睛，感受深深的绝望吧！”
troy_main_anc_item_gorgoneion.effect: +3% to success chance of all spy actions

troy_main_anc_item_minos_ring.colourText: The ring's wearer may claim kinship with Poseidon himself, and benefit from his divine bounty.
troy_main_anc_item_minos_ring.localisedColourText: 佩戴此戒者将视同波塞冬的亲族，并从他的神圣恩惠中受益。
troy_main_anc_item_minos_ring.effect: -20% to attrition in deep sea waters|Favour of Poseidon: +3 per turn
troy_main_anc_item_minos_ring.localisedEffect: 深海损耗-20%|波塞冬的眷顾：每回合+3

troy_main_anc_item_seal_thebes.colourText: Who would not want to follow in Heracles' noble, titanic footsteps?
troy_main_anc_item_seal_thebes.localisedColourText: 像赫拉克勒斯这样的高贵巨人，谁不愿意追随他呢？
troy_main_anc_item_seal_thebes.effect: -20% to recruitment cost of Spartoi|+30 to growth in the local province
troy_main_anc_item_seal_thebes.localisedEffect: 地生人征募花费-20%|该行省发展+30

troy_main_anc_item_pelasgian_chlamys.colourText: This lightweight cape is ideal for avoiding sunburn in the punishing daytime heat, enabling daily life to continue relatively unhindered by the climate.
troy_main_anc_item_pelasgian_chlamys.localisedColourText: 这身轻便的斗篷很适合在酷热的天气里用来遮阳，以便减少气候对人们生活的影响。
troy_main_anc_item_pelasgian_chlamys.effect: +4 to happiness in the local province

troy_main_anc_item_lelgan_himation.colourText: Worn over the kithon or peplos tunic, the himation is a heavier garment than other cloaks, for wearing at night or during the winter months.
troy_main_anc_item_lelgan_himation.localisedColourText: 长袍是穿在宽袍或大披肩外面的衣物，比其他的斗篷要重一些，主要适用于夜晚和冬季。
troy_main_anc_item_lelgan_himation.effect: +2 to motivation|+8 to diplomatic relations with the Trojans (Pelasgians, Leleges, Maeonians, Thracians)
troy_main_anc_item_lelgan_himation.localisedEffect: 斗志+2|与特洛伊人（佩拉斯吉人、莱勒格斯人、梅奥尼亚人、色雷斯人）的外交关系+8

troy_main_anc_armour_diomedes_armour.colourText: Hephaestus made this fine golden armour at the behest of Athena, who wished only the best for her chosen favourite.
troy_main_anc_armour_diomedes_armour.localisedColourText: 雅典娜希望被她选中的战士能有一副世上最好的铠甲，于是赫淮斯托斯按她的要求打造了这套金甲。
troy_main_anc_armour_diomedes_armour.effect: +4 to melee defence of Hero|+5% to morale of sword and axe units
troy_main_anc_armour_diomedes_armour.localisedEffect: 英雄近战防御+4|持剑、持斧部队士气+5%

troy_main_anc_follower_briseis.colourText: When someone is your captive, you own every aspect of their life.
troy_main_anc_follower_briseis.localisedColourText: 成为你俘虏的敌人，命运将完全由你处置。
troy_main_anc_follower_briseis.effect: +5% to campaign movement range of Hero's army when on land
troy_main_anc_follower_briseis.localisedEffect: 英雄所在军队陆地战役地图移动距离+5%

troy_main_anc_mount_odysseus_bow_spec_sh.colourText: This very fast, very light chariot is the perfect platform from which the Hero can shoot the enemy dead in their tracks.
troy_main_anc_mount_odysseus_bow_spec_sh.localisedColourText: 这辆轻便快捷的战车是英雄射杀敌人的完美平台。

troy_main_anc_weapon_syrinx_hornbow.colourText: This bow was made from the antlers of an elk or deer who was once the quarry of the most beautiful of nymphs.
troy_main_anc_weapon_syrinx_hornbow.localisedColourText: 这张弓是用最为美丽的仙女狩猎之物的鹿角制成。
troy_main_anc_weapon_syrinx_hornbow.effect: -8% to recruitment cost of missile units|+12% to missile damage of missile units in Hero's army
troy_main_anc_weapon_syrinx_hornbow.localisedEffect: 远程部队征募花费-8%|英雄所在军队中远程部队远程杀伤+12%

troy_main_anc_mount_myc_agamemnon_javeli.colourText: This fast, light chariot is mostly used for skirmishing due to its ability to get into the action and out again at speed.
troy_main_anc_mount_myc_agamemnon_javeli.localisedColourText: 这种快速、轻便的战车很适合用于袭扰敌军，它可以快速切入战场，也能轻易地脱离战斗。

troy_main_anc_weapon_jason_sceptre.colourText: "O Queen Hera, summon your mists to bless us, so we may complete our journey in safety."
troy_main_anc_weapon_jason_sceptre.localisedColourText: “哦，天后赫拉，愿您的薄雾庇佑我们，让我们安然地完成旅途。”
troy_main_anc_weapon_jason_sceptre.effect: -15% to attrition from desertion|-15% to attrition in deep sea waters
troy_main_anc_weapon_jason_sceptre.localisedEffect: 逃兵造成的损耗-15%|深海损耗-15%

troy_dlc1_anc_mount_hip_hero_skirmisher_.colourText: This mighty charger, specifically bred for war, is large enough to enable the Hero to shoot with greater range than the average horse.
troy_dlc1_anc_mount_hip_hero_skirmisher_.localisedColourText: 这匹强大的战马专为战争而饲养，它体型庞大，可以让英雄在比平时更远的距离进行射击。

troy_main_anc_item_aeolian_himation.colourText: Worn over the kithon or peplos tunic, the himation is a heavier garment than other cloaks, for wearing at night or during the winter months.
troy_main_anc_item_aeolian_himation.localisedColourText: 长袍是穿在宽袍或大披肩外面的衣物，比其他的斗篷要重一些，主要适用于夜晚和冬季。
troy_main_anc_item_aeolian_himation.effect: +2 to motivation|+6 to diplomatic relations with the Danaans (Achaeans, Aeolians, Dorians, Ionians)
troy_main_anc_item_aeolian_himation.localisedEffect: 斗志+2|与达南人（亚该亚人、伊奥利亚人、多里安人、爱奥尼亚人）的外交关系+6

troy_main_anc_mount_aeneas_melee_spec_ja.colourText: This medium-weight chariot enables the Hero to stay close to the fray whilst throwing their javelins at the foe.
troy_main_anc_mount_aeneas_melee_spec_ja.localisedColourText: 这辆中等重量的战车可载着英雄在近距离向敌人投掷标枪。

troy_main_anc_mount_archer_trickster_bow.colourText: This very fast, very light chariot is the perfect platform from which the Hero can shoot the enemy dead in their tracks.
troy_main_anc_mount_archer_trickster_bow.localisedColourText: 这辆轻便快捷的战车是英雄射杀敌人的完美平台。

troy_main_anc_mount_boeotian_ship.colourText: As many as one hundred and fifty rowers can man the oars of this large, swift vessel designed and built in the Gulf of Corinth.
troy_main_anc_mount_boeotian_ship.localisedColourText: 这艘巨舰在科林斯湾设计和建造，最多可以容纳一百五十名桨手，行动十分迅速。
troy_main_anc_mount_boeotian_ship.effect: +12% to campaign movement range of Hero's army when at sea
troy_main_anc_mount_boeotian_ship.localisedEffect: 英雄所在军队海上移动距离+12%

troy_adi_anc_armour_salamian_curiass.colourText: "But for fine bronze, many a spearhead would have come to rest between my ribs."
troy_adi_anc_armour_salamian_curiass.localisedColourText: “若是没有这精良的青铜，我的肋骨之间一定早已插满了长矛。”
troy_adi_anc_armour_salamian_curiass.effect: +10 to armour of Hero|+10 to melee defence of Hero
troy_adi_anc_armour_salamian_curiass.localisedEffect: 英雄护甲+10|英雄近战防御+10

troy_main_anc_item_prometheus_oil.colourText: A healing ointment to strengthen and protect.
troy_main_anc_item_prometheus_oil.localisedColourText: 用于强化与保护身体的治疗药膏。
troy_main_anc_item_prometheus_oil.effect: "Blessed Leaders" ability: instant recovery of Heroes when wounded |Immune to attrition
troy_main_anc_item_prometheus_oil.localisedEffect: “天佑领袖”能力：英雄受伤后立即恢复 |免疫损耗

troy_main_anc_item_statue_ares.colourText: Man's inner beast, given substance through this idol of the war-god Ares, occurs much to the chagrin of his sister Athena.
troy_main_anc_item_statue_ares.localisedColourText: 战神阿瑞斯的雕像可以激发人类内心的兽性，但也会激怒他的姐姐雅典娜。
troy_main_anc_item_statue_ares.effect: +1 to motivation|+5% to melee attack of sword and axe units
troy_main_anc_item_statue_ares.localisedEffect: 斗志+1|持剑、持斧部队近战攻击+5%

troy_main_anc_armour_athena_helm.colourText: Athena's ornate Corinthian helmet, worn pushed back from her face, is decorated with spikes and plumes, and embossed with scenes depicting warriors from a hundred ancient kingdoms.
troy_main_anc_armour_athena_helm.localisedColourText: 雅典娜头戴着华丽的科林斯式头盔，装饰有顶饰和羽毛，还有一些浮雕图案，刻画的是来自一百个古国的战士们。
troy_main_anc_armour_athena_helm.effect: +5 to armour of Hero|+5 to melee defence of Hero
troy_main_anc_armour_athena_helm.localisedEffect: 英雄护甲+5|英雄近战防御+5

troy_dlc1_anc_mount_pen_hero_warlord_uti.colourText: This large, sturdy, yet swift beast is capable of carrying extra javelins for its skirmishing rider to hurl at the enemy.
troy_dlc1_anc_mount_pen_hero_warlord_uti.localisedColourText: 这只庞大、健壮而又敏捷的猛兽可以携带额外的标枪，供它背上的骑手向敌人投掷。

troy_main_anc_item_iphigenia_ashes.colourText: Although she was daughter to King Agamemnon and his queen, Clytemnestra, this Mycenaean princess had to die in order to appease Artemis.
troy_main_anc_item_iphigenia_ashes.localisedColourText: 这位迈锡尼公主虽然是阿伽门农国王和克吕泰涅斯特拉王后的女儿，但为了安抚阿耳忒弥斯，却不得不死去。
troy_main_anc_item_iphigenia_ashes.effect: -30% to attrition in Hero's army|+10% to campaign movement range of Hero's army when at sea
troy_main_anc_item_iphigenia_ashes.localisedEffect: 英雄所在军队损耗-30%|英雄所在军队海上移动距离+10%

troy_main_anc_golden_fleece.colourText: The fleece of a golden-winged ram sired of Poseidon is a symbol of both the authority and prosperity of its wearer.
troy_main_anc_golden_fleece.localisedColourText: 波塞冬所育的金羊之毛象征着佩戴者的权威和昌盛。

troy_main_anc_armour_achilles_armour.colourText: The great warrior's armour, fashioned from bronze, gleams like the very heart of a fiery blaze.
troy_main_anc_armour_achilles_armour.localisedColourText: 这位伟大战士的铠甲是由青铜打造，如同炽热的火焰一样闪耀着光芒。
troy_main_anc_armour_achilles_armour.effect: +10% to battle speed of the Hero|+10% to morale of own units|+10 to melee defence of Hero
troy_main_anc_armour_achilles_armour.localisedEffect: 英雄战斗移速+10%|己方部队士气+10%|英雄近战防御+10

troy_main_anc_item_aeolian_chlamys.colourText: This lightweight cape is ideal for avoiding sunburn in the punishing daytime heat, enabling daily life to continue relatively unhindered by the climate.
troy_main_anc_item_aeolian_chlamys.localisedColourText: 这身轻便的斗篷很适合在酷热的天气里用来遮阳，以便减少气候对人们生活的影响。
troy_main_anc_item_aeolian_chlamys.effect: +3 to happiness in the local province

troy_main_anc_item_pan_syrinx.colourText: This seven-tubed pan-flute was made by the nature-god Pan from the body of Syrinx the dryad, so she could escape his affections.
troy_main_anc_item_pan_syrinx.localisedColourText: 自然之神潘为了不让林精灵绪任克斯逃离他的追求，将她的身体做成了七管排箫。
troy_main_anc_item_pan_syrinx.effect: +4 to happiness in the local province| +2 to motivation

troy_dlc1_anc_mount_hip_hero_warlord_tac.colourText: This fast mount is suitable for bearing a skirmisher within range and then expeditiously back to a safe distance.
troy_dlc1_anc_mount_hip_hero_warlord_tac.localisedColourText: 这匹坐骑速度飞快，可以带着突袭者迅速地撤退到安全距离。

troy_main_anc_item_seal_lyrnessos.colourText: King Euenos' seal is used to attract warriors of courage and tenacity to his court.
troy_main_anc_item_seal_lyrnessos.localisedColourText: 尤纳斯国王的印章可以用来吸引勇敢坚韧的武士来到他的麾下。
troy_main_anc_item_seal_lyrnessos.effect: +1 to recruitment capacity of Hero's army|-8% to recruitment cost of missile units in Hero's army
troy_main_anc_item_seal_lyrnessos.localisedEffect: 英雄所在军队征募容量+1|英雄所在军队远程部队征募花费-8%

troy_main_anc_weapon_artemis_bow.colourText: This elaborate golden bow fires shining, golden arrows with perfect aim and devastating results.
troy_main_anc_weapon_artemis_bow.localisedColourText: 这把精美的金弓射出闪亮的黄金箭，精准而致命。
troy_main_anc_weapon_artemis_bow.effect: +20% to missile damage of Hero|+5% to range of missile units in Hero's army
troy_main_anc_weapon_artemis_bow.localisedEffect: 英雄远程杀伤+20%|英雄所在军队中远程部队射程+5%

troy_main_anc_weapon_peleus_spear.colourText: Fashioned from the strongest black ash by the centaur Chiron, this spear was gifted to Achilles' father and inherited by the great warrior upon his death.
troy_main_anc_weapon_peleus_spear.localisedColourText: 这把长矛由半人马喀戎用最结实的黑梣木制成，并送给阿喀琉斯的父亲，在他死后被传给这位伟大的勇士。
troy_main_anc_weapon_peleus_spear.effect: +4 to charge of all units|+7% to armour-piercing damage of Hero
troy_main_anc_weapon_peleus_spear.localisedEffect: 所有部队冲锋+4|英雄破甲杀伤+7%

troy_main_anc_mount_penteconter_ship.colourText: This long-range galley attains its impressive speeds through its revolutionary sharp keel design and the back-breaking toil of fifty men rowing in concert.
troy_main_anc_mount_penteconter_ship.localisedColourText: 这艘远程大帆船配备了革命性的尖龙骨设计，五十名强壮桨手的协同配合令它拥有了惊人的速度。
troy_main_anc_mount_penteconter_ship.effect: +10% to campaign movement range of Hero's army when at sea
troy_main_anc_mount_penteconter_ship.localisedEffect: 英雄所在军队海上移动距离+10%

troy_dlc1_anc_mount_pen_hero_fighter_dis.colourText: This fast mount is suitable for bearing a skirmisher within range and then expeditiously back to a safe distance.
troy_dlc1_anc_mount_pen_hero_fighter_dis.localisedColourText: 这匹坐骑速度飞快，可以带着突袭者迅速地撤退到安全距离。

troy_main_anc_item_ivory_necklace.colourText: The easily bribed are, oft-times, also the easiest to kill.
troy_main_anc_item_ivory_necklace.localisedColourText: 最容易贿赂的人往往也是最容易杀掉的。
troy_main_anc_item_ivory_necklace.effect: -5% to action cost for this agent

troy_main_anc_follower_clymene.colourText: Forsaken by her father, who feared she would kill him, Clymene is part-advisor, part-assassin, and not to be underestimated.
troy_main_anc_follower_clymene.localisedColourText: 克吕墨涅的父亲怕自己被女儿杀死，于是抛弃了她。她既是一位顾问也是一位杀手，不可小觑。
troy_main_anc_follower_clymene.effect: +3 to motivation|+5% to morale of all units in own territory
troy_main_anc_follower_clymene.localisedEffect: 斗志+3|位于己方领土时，所有部队士气+5%

troy_main_anc_weapon_peleus_sword.colourText: This wondrous sword was forged by the gods themselves, that its wielder would be unbeatable.
troy_main_anc_weapon_peleus_sword.localisedColourText: 这把剑由众神亲自锻造，持有它的人将战无不胜。
troy_main_anc_weapon_peleus_sword.effect: +15% to melee damage of Hero in battles against Trojans|+8 to melee attack of Hero
troy_main_anc_weapon_peleus_sword.localisedEffect: 与特洛伊人战斗时，英雄近战杀伤+15%|英雄近战攻击+8

troy_adi_anc_weapon_salamian_bow.colourText: The sturdy limbs of this great bow double as a guard against enemy blades.
troy_adi_anc_weapon_salamian_bow.localisedColourText: 这把强弓结实的弓身也可以抵御敌人的刀剑。
troy_adi_anc_weapon_salamian_bow.effect: +25% to missile damage of Hero|+5% to missile range of Hero
troy_adi_anc_weapon_salamian_bow.localisedEffect: 英雄远程杀伤+25%|英雄射程+5%

troy_dlc1_anc_mount_pen_penthesilea_char.colourText: This extremely-heavy chariot is best used for punching through battle lines while the Hero it bears uses their spear two-handed to cut the enemy down.
troy_dlc1_anc_mount_pen_penthesilea_char.localisedColourText: 这辆极重的战车最适合冲锋陷阵，车上的英雄能够双手挥舞长矛斩杀敌人。

troy_main_anc_item_elaborate_amphorae.colourText: Not suitable for everyday use, this finely-made vessel comes out for special occasions, such as total victory.
troy_main_anc_item_elaborate_amphorae.localisedColourText: 此容器做工精美，非为日常所用，唯大捷之时大庆之日才可一睹其容。
troy_main_anc_item_elaborate_amphorae.effect: -4% to upkeep cost of all units

troy_main_anc_mount_fighter_killer_melee.colourText: This extremely-heavy chariot is best used for punching through battle lines while the Hero it bears uses their spear two-handed to cut the enemy down.
troy_main_anc_mount_fighter_killer_melee.localisedColourText: 这辆极重的战车最适合冲锋陷阵，车上的英雄能够双手挥舞长矛斩杀敌人。

troy_main_anc_item_seal_argos.colourText: The seal of Argos' ruler entices the bravest, most-skilled warriors to their banner.
troy_main_anc_item_seal_argos.localisedColourText: 阿尔戈斯统治者的印章吸引了最勇敢、最精锐的战士聚集到他们旗下。
troy_main_anc_item_seal_argos.effect: -10% to upkeep cost of centaur units|-20% to recruitment cost of chariot units|+8 to happiness in the local province
troy_main_anc_item_seal_argos.localisedEffect: 半人马部队维护费-10%|战车部队征募花费-20%|本行省满意度+8

troy_main_anc_weapon_argive_sword.colourText: A fine, Argive blade fit for the ruler of Argos himself.
troy_main_anc_weapon_argive_sword.localisedColourText: 这把精美的阿尔戈斯刀正适合阿尔戈斯的统治者。
troy_main_anc_weapon_argive_sword.effect: +10% to melee damage of Hero in battles against Trojans
troy_main_anc_weapon_argive_sword.localisedEffect: 与特洛伊人战斗时，英雄近战杀伤+10%

troy_main_anc_weapon_agamemnon_javelin.colourText: The great Mycenaean king is unrivalled in spear-throwing, both during funerary games and on the field of battle.
troy_main_anc_weapon_agamemnon_javelin.localisedColourText: 无论是在葬礼仪式上还是在战场上，在投掷长矛方面没有人比得上伟大的迈锡尼国王。
troy_main_anc_weapon_agamemnon_javelin.effect: +9% to ranged armour-piercing damage of Hero|+10% to range of javelin units in Hero's army|+10% to missile and armour-piercing missile damage of javelin units
troy_main_anc_weapon_agamemnon_javelin.localisedEffect: 英雄远程破甲杀伤+9%|英雄所在军队中标枪手部队射程+10%|标枪部队远程伤害和远程破甲伤害+10%

troy_main_anc_armour_eteoclus_shield.localisedColourText: “哪怕是阿瑞斯也无法击倒他。”
troy_main_anc_armour_eteoclus_shield.effect: +2 to motivation|+3 to melee defence of Hero

troy_main_anc_item_swift_mule.colourText: This one is not only capable of carrying heavy loads far longer than can a man, it can run if needs be to cover ground quickly.
troy_main_anc_item_swift_mule.localisedColourText: 它不仅能在载重时比人走得更远，还能在必要时迅速奔跑。
troy_main_anc_item_swift_mule.effect: +8% to campaign movement range of host army
troy_main_anc_item_swift_mule.localisedEffect: 己方军队战役地图移动距离+8%

troy_main_anc_mount_triaconter_ship.colourText: A fast ship requiring the strength of thirty rowers to ensure that rough waters are navigated as quickly as possible.
troy_main_anc_mount_triaconter_ship.localisedColourText: 这种快船需要配备三十名强壮桨手，可以在波涛汹涌中乘风破浪迅速航行。
troy_main_anc_mount_triaconter_ship.effect: +8% to campaign movement range of Hero's army when at sea
troy_main_anc_mount_triaconter_ship.localisedEffect: 英雄所在军队海上移动距离+8%

troy_main_anc_item_hesperides_apples.colourText: All may benefit from Gaia's nourishing bounty.
troy_main_anc_item_hesperides_apples.localisedColourText: 所有人都将从盖亚的滋养中受益。
troy_main_anc_item_hesperides_apples.effect: +15% food per turn| -1 to construction time in province capitals
troy_main_anc_item_hesperides_apples.localisedEffect: 每回合粮食收入 +15%|行省首府内建造时间-1

troy_main_anc_item_seal_sparta.effect: +2 to recruitment capacity of Hero's army|-10% to recruitment cost of units in Hero's army|-10% to recruitment cost of spear units
troy_main_anc_item_seal_sparta.localisedEffect: 英雄所在军队征募容量+2|英雄所在军队征募花费-10%|持矛部队征募花费-10%

troy_main_anc_weapon_erysichthon_axe.colourText: Much more than a simple woodsman's axe. Be careful who you kill with it, for Demeter is surely watching.
troy_main_anc_weapon_erysichthon_axe.localisedColourText: 这可不仅仅是一把简单的伐木斧。拿它杀人的时候可注意着点，因为得墨忒耳注视着你。
troy_main_anc_weapon_erysichthon_axe.effect: +1 to recruit rank of axe units|+7 to melee attack of Hero
troy_main_anc_weapon_erysichthon_axe.localisedEffect: 持斧部队征募等级+1|英雄近战攻击+7

troy_main_anc_item_minoan_necklace.colourText: This beautiful piece is also a symbol of Minoan royal power.
troy_main_anc_item_minoan_necklace.localisedColourText: 这件美丽的工艺品也是米诺斯王权的象征。

troy_main_anc_item_seal_troy.colourText: King Priam is known and respected throughout the world for his exceptional courage and wisdom.
troy_main_anc_item_seal_troy.localisedColourText: 普里阿摩斯王以其非凡的勇气和智慧被世人称颂并尊重。
troy_main_anc_item_seal_troy.effect: Happiness: +8|+50 to growth in the local province|+20 to diplomatic relations with the Trojans (Pelasgians, Leleges, Maeonians, Thracians)
troy_main_anc_item_seal_troy.localisedEffect: 满意度: +8|该行省发展+50|与特洛伊人（佩拉斯吉人、莱勒格斯人、梅奥尼亚人、色雷斯人）的外交关系+20

troy_main_anc_weapon_white_granite_club.colourText: The tip of this fearsome club is made of white granite for that satisfying skullsplitting sound.
troy_main_anc_weapon_white_granite_club.localisedColourText: 这个可怕的棍棒有白色花岗岩制成的棍头，当它砸到头盖骨时会发出令人愉悦的声音。
troy_main_anc_weapon_white_granite_club.effect: +1 to motivation|+50 to melee damage of Hero

troy_main_anc_item_silver_lire.colourText: "I sing in praise of Total War!"
troy_main_anc_item_silver_lire.localisedColourText: “让我唱一曲全面战争的颂歌！”
troy_main_anc_item_silver_lire.effect: -10% to success chance of enemy agent actions against this agent
troy_main_anc_item_silver_lire.localisedEffect: 敌方事务官针对该事务官的行动成功率-10%

troy_dlc1_anc_mount_hip_hero_warlord_tac.colourText: This most sturdy, well-made heavy chariot is capable of bearing the Hero into combat and breaking through the toughest frontline with relative ease.
troy_dlc1_anc_mount_hip_hero_warlord_tac.localisedColourText: 这辆制作精良的重型战车坚固无比，能够载着英雄进入战斗，并轻易突破最稳固的阵线。

troy_main_anc_item_harmonia_necklace.colourText: Eternal youth sounds like a blessing, but the necklace is cursed to bring continual misfortune to its wearer.
troy_main_anc_item_harmonia_necklace.localisedColourText: 永恒的青春听起来像是种祝福，但这项链已被诅咒，将会给它的佩戴者带来长久的不幸。
troy_main_anc_item_harmonia_necklace.effect: -2 to turns Hero spends wounded|Grants passive hitpoint regeneration to Hero
troy_main_anc_item_harmonia_necklace.localisedEffect: 英雄重伤恢复回合数-2|英雄获得被动生命值回复

troy_main_anc_armour_achilles_helm.colourText: Achilles' heavy helmet is decorated with red plumes, making him easily spottable amongst the fray.
troy_main_anc_armour_achilles_helm.localisedColourText: 阿喀琉斯的重型头盔上装饰着红色羽毛，使得他在战场中极为显眼。
troy_main_anc_armour_achilles_helm.effect: +10% to battle speed of the Hero|+3 to melee defence of Hero
troy_main_anc_armour_achilles_helm.localisedEffect: 英雄战斗移速+10%|英雄近战防御+3

troy_main_anc_follower_personal_physicia.colourText: "Take this, it will soothe you. What is it? Oh, just a blend of herbs and roots mixed with honey."
troy_main_anc_follower_personal_physicia.localisedColourText: “吃点这个吧，能让你舒服一些。你问我它是什么？只不过是些拌了蜂蜜的草药和草根。”
troy_main_anc_follower_personal_physicia.effect: +6% to casualty replenishment rate of all armies

troy_main_anc_mount_defender_tank_melee_.colourText: This medium-weight chariot enables the Hero to stay close to the fray whilst throwing their javelins at the foe.
troy_main_anc_mount_defender_tank_melee_.localisedColourText: 这辆中等重量的战车可载着英雄在近距离向敌人投掷标枪。

troy_main_anc_weapon_celestial_iron_arro.colourText: Like Zeus piercing thunderbolts, yet made by mortal hands.
troy_main_anc_weapon_celestial_iron_arro.localisedColourText: 锐如宙斯刺破长空的雷霆，却是出自凡人之手。
troy_main_anc_weapon_celestial_iron_arro.effect: +1 to motivation|+20% missile damage to missile attack of Hero
troy_main_anc_weapon_celestial_iron_arro.localisedEffect: 斗志+1|英雄远程攻击杀伤+20%

troy_main_anc_mount_warlord_tactician_ja.colourText: This fast, light chariot is mostly used for skirmishing due to its ability to get into the action and out again at speed.
troy_main_anc_mount_warlord_tactician_ja.localisedColourText: 这种快速、轻便的战车很适合用于袭扰敌军，它可以快速切入战场，也能轻易地脱离战斗。

troy_main_anc_item_minoan_royal_tablet.colourText: The commands of the king, etched into clay for posterity, if not eternity.
troy_main_anc_item_minoan_royal_tablet.localisedColourText: 国王的命令被铭刻在泥版上，就算无法永恒流传，也能福泽子孙后代。
troy_main_anc_item_minoan_royal_tablet.effect: -7% to construction cost of all main buildings| +1 to motivation
troy_main_anc_item_minoan_royal_tablet.localisedEffect: 所有核心建筑建造成本-7%|斗志+1

troy_main_anc_mount_defender_quick_javel.colourText: This extremely-heavy chariot is best used for punching through battle lines while the Hero it bears uses their spear two-handed to cut the enemy down.
troy_main_anc_mount_defender_quick_javel.localisedColourText: 这辆极重的战车最适合冲锋陷阵，车上的英雄能够双手挥舞长矛斩杀敌人。

troy_main_anc_follower_chryseis.colourText: It's not unusual for hostages to become the concubines of their captors, as such things tend to ensure they live longer.
troy_main_anc_follower_chryseis.localisedColourText: 女俘虏常常被俘获她的人纳为侍妾，不过至少能让她们活得长一些。

troy_main_anc_item_golden_box.colourText: "I'm going to keep my opponents' thumbs in it and show it to new recruits. They'll know they're on the winning side then."
troy_main_anc_item_golden_box.localisedColourText: “我会留下敌人的拇指，展示给新兵看。这样，他们就会知道我们是必胜的。”

troy_adi_anc_armour_salamian_girdle.colourText: This great belt could bind a giant's waist with length to spare.
troy_adi_anc_armour_salamian_girdle.localisedColourText: 这条巨大的腰带即便是被巨人系在腰间也仍有余裕。
troy_adi_anc_armour_salamian_girdle.effect: -10% to recruitment cost of units in Hero's army
troy_adi_anc_armour_salamian_girdle.localisedEffect: 英雄所在军队征募花费-10%

troy_dlc1_anc_mount_hip_hero_fighter_kil.colourText: This extremely-heavy chariot is best used for punching through battle lines while the Hero it bears uses their spear two-handed to cut the enemy down.
troy_dlc1_anc_mount_hip_hero_fighter_kil.localisedColourText: 这辆极重的战车最适合冲锋陷阵，车上的英雄能够双手挥舞长矛斩杀敌人。

troy_main_anc_item_orpheus_lyre.colourText: Music soothes restless minds and calms frayed nerves, so that common sense might prevail.
troy_main_anc_item_orpheus_lyre.localisedColourText: 音乐能抚慰不安的心灵，舒缓紧张的神经，让人重新恢复理智。
troy_main_anc_item_orpheus_lyre.effect: +10 to diplomatic relations with the Danaans (Achaeans, Aeolians, Dorians, Ionians)|+10 to diplomatic relations with the Trojans (Pelasgians, Leleges, Maeonians, Thracians)
troy_main_anc_item_orpheus_lyre.localisedEffect: 与达南人（亚该亚人、伊奥利亚人、多里安人、爱奥尼亚人）的外交关系+10|与特洛伊人（佩拉斯吉人、莱勒格斯人、梅奥尼亚人、色雷斯人）的外交关系+10

troy_main_anc_mount_defender_quick_javel.colourText: This fast, light chariot is mostly used for skirmishing due to its ability to get into the action and out again at speed.
troy_main_anc_mount_defender_quick_javel.localisedColourText: 这种快速、轻便的战车很适合用于袭扰敌军，它可以快速切入战场，也能轻易地脱离战斗。

troy_adi_anc_armour_glaucus_golden_armou.colourText: The golden armour of Glaucos, who fought against Diomedes with a fury worthy of Ares himself.
troy_adi_anc_armour_glaucus_golden_armou.localisedColourText: 这是格劳科斯的黄金铠甲，他曾经怀着可与阿瑞斯相比的盛怒与狄俄墨德斯交战。
troy_adi_anc_armour_glaucus_golden_armou.effect: +20 to armour of Hero|+20 to melee defence of Hero|+10 to melee attack of Hero
troy_adi_anc_armour_glaucus_golden_armou.localisedEffect: 英雄护甲+20|英雄近战防御+20|英雄近战攻击+10

troy_main_anc_item_mandrake_herb.localisedColourText: “月之子，听听曼德拉草的尖叫吧！”
troy_main_anc_item_mandrake_herb.effect: +5% to casualty replenishment rate of all armies

troy_main_anc_item_thracian_chlamys.colourText: This lightweight cape is ideal for avoiding sunburn in the punishing daytime heat, enabling daily life to continue relatively unhindered by the climate.
troy_main_anc_item_thracian_chlamys.localisedColourText: 这身轻便的斗篷很适合在酷热的天气里用来遮阳，以便减少气候对人们生活的影响。
troy_main_anc_item_thracian_chlamys.effect: +2 to happiness in the local province

troy_main_anc_item_thracian_himation.colourText: Worn over the kithon or peplos tunic, the himation is a heavier garment than other cloaks, for wearing at night or during the winter months.
troy_main_anc_item_thracian_himation.localisedColourText: 长袍是穿在宽袍或大披肩外面的衣物，比其他的斗篷要重一些，主要适用于夜晚和冬季。
troy_main_anc_item_thracian_himation.effect: +2 to motivation|+4 to diplomatic relations with the Trojans (Pelasgians, Leleges, Maeonians, Thracians)
troy_main_anc_item_thracian_himation.localisedEffect: 斗志+2|与特洛伊人（佩拉斯吉人、莱勒格斯人、梅奥尼亚人、色雷斯人）的外交关系+4

troy_dlc1_anc_mount_pen_hero_skirmisher_.colourText: This speedy horse will get its rider close enough to the enemy to loose their arrows and then quickly back out of range again.
troy_dlc1_anc_mount_pen_hero_skirmisher_.localisedColourText: 这匹快马可以载着骑手快速接近敌人，然后在挽弓放箭后快速拉开距离。

troy_main_anc_item_golden_grapevine.colourText: Grown by Zeus himself and presented to mortal Tros in return for his son Ganymede, the grapevine has the power to buy allegiances.
troy_main_anc_item_golden_grapevine.localisedColourText: 宙斯将这根能带来忠诚的葡萄藤赠与凡人特洛斯，用来换取他的儿子伽倪墨得斯成为众神的侍酒。
troy_main_anc_item_golden_grapevine.effect: Happiness: +5|+400 food per turn|+30 to growth in the local province
troy_main_anc_item_golden_grapevine.localisedEffect: 满意度: +5|+400 每回合粮食收入|该行省发展+30

troy_main_anc_armour_menelaus_shield.colourText: Menelaus' circular, bronze shield is notable for its width; held centrally it will protect the whole of its bearer's midriff.
troy_main_anc_armour_menelaus_shield.localisedColourText: 墨涅拉俄斯的青铜圆盾宽阔无比，只要抓住中间，就能保护使用者的整个躯干。
troy_main_anc_armour_menelaus_shield.effect: +10% to morale of all units when besieging|+4 to melee defence of Hero
troy_main_anc_armour_menelaus_shield.localisedEffect: 围城时所有部队士气+10%|英雄近战防御+4

troy_dlc1_anc_mount_hip_hero_fighter_bal.colourText: This extremely-heavy chariot is best used for punching through battle lines while the Hero it bears uses their spear two-handed to cut the enemy down.
troy_dlc1_anc_mount_hip_hero_fighter_bal.localisedColourText: 这辆极重的战车最适合冲锋陷阵，车上的英雄能够双手挥舞长矛斩杀敌人。

troy_main_anc_item_ionian_kithon.colourText: This linen or wool cloak, made from a single rectangle of cloth, is worn draped across the body and is fastened at the shoulder with a pin or clasp.
troy_main_anc_item_ionian_kithon.localisedColourText: 斗篷通常是由一整块亚麻布或羊毛制成，穿戴时垂下来遮盖住全身，并在肩膀处用别针或扣子固定。

troy_adi_anc_weapon_salamian_spear.colourText: The shaft of this great spear is crafted from the whole trunk of a young ash-wood tree.
troy_adi_anc_weapon_salamian_spear.localisedColourText: 这把强大长矛的矛杆是用一棵年轻白蜡木的整个树干做成的。
troy_adi_anc_weapon_salamian_spear.effect: +70 to melee damage of Hero against spear units
troy_adi_anc_weapon_salamian_spear.localisedEffect: 英雄对矛兵部队造成的近战伤害+70

troy_main_anc_item_large_amphorae.effect: -2% to upkeep cost of all units

troy_main_anc_follower_expert_administra.colourText: Keeping an army fully supplied and on target is not an easy feat. It takes a highly organised individual to do it well.
troy_main_anc_follower_expert_administra.localisedColourText: 要保证一支军队目标明确、补给充足并不是一件容易的事。长于统帅的人才能把这件事做好。
troy_main_anc_follower_expert_administra.effect: -2 to siege holdout time (minimum 1 turn)|-10% to upkeep cost of all units in Hero's army
troy_main_anc_follower_expert_administra.localisedEffect: 围城坚持时间-2（至少1回合）|英雄所在军队内所有部队维护费-10%

troy_main_anc_armour_reinforced_helmet.colourText: Extra layers of padding or scales decrease the chances of blade or point or arrow piercing the helm and killing its wearer.
troy_main_anc_armour_reinforced_helmet.localisedColourText: 这顶头盔上额外增加的衬垫能降低敌人的剑矛弓矢击穿头盔、杀死佩戴者的概率。
troy_main_anc_armour_reinforced_helmet.effect: +3 to motivation|+5 to armour of Hero

troy_main_anc_weapon_atalanta_bow.colourText: Expertly fashioned by the Amazons, this bow is wielded by the fierce virgin huntress, Atalanta.
troy_main_anc_weapon_atalanta_bow.localisedColourText: 这张弓由亚马逊人精心制作，由凶猛的处女猎人阿塔兰塔使用。
troy_main_anc_weapon_atalanta_bow.effect: +10% to morale of own missile units|+20% to missile range of Hero
troy_main_anc_weapon_atalanta_bow.localisedEffect: 己方远程部队士气+10%|英雄射程+20%

troy_main_anc_item_golden_lamp.colourText: "I can see for miles and miles and miles and miles and miles!"
troy_main_anc_item_golden_lamp.effect: +25% to line of sight on campaign map

troy_dlc1_anc_mount_pen_hero_warlord_uti.colourText: This most sturdy, well-made heavy chariot is capable of bearing the Hero into combat and breaking through the toughest frontline with relative ease.
troy_dlc1_anc_mount_pen_hero_warlord_uti.localisedColourText: 这辆制作精良的重型战车坚固无比，能够载着英雄进入战斗，并轻易突破最稳固的阵线。

troy_main_anc_item_ionian_himation.colourText: Worn over the kithon or peplos tunic, the himation is a heavier garment than other cloaks, for wearing at night or during the winter months.
troy_main_anc_item_ionian_himation.localisedColourText: 长袍是穿在宽袍或大披肩外面的衣物，比其他的斗篷要重一些，主要适用于夜晚和冬季。
troy_main_anc_item_ionian_himation.effect: +2 to motivation|+8 to diplomatic relations with the Danaans (Achaeans, Aeolians, Dorians, Ionians)
troy_main_anc_item_ionian_himation.localisedEffect: 斗志+2|与达南人（亚该亚人、伊奥利亚人、多里安人、爱奥尼亚人）的外交关系+8

troy_main_anc_mount_fighter_disruptor_ja.colourText: This fast, light chariot is mostly used for skirmishing due to its ability to get into the action and out again at speed.
troy_main_anc_mount_fighter_disruptor_ja.localisedColourText: 这种快速、轻便的战车很适合用于袭扰敌军，它可以快速切入战场，也能轻易地脱离战斗。

troy_main_anc_item_statue_apollo.colourText: Reliance on Apollo for protection at sea is bound to anger Poseidon.
troy_main_anc_item_statue_apollo.localisedColourText: 在海上依赖阿波罗的保护必然会激怒波塞冬。
troy_main_anc_item_statue_apollo.effect: +1 to motivation|+10% to range of archer units

troy_dlc1_anc_mount_hip_hero_warmonger_h.colourText: This hardy breed are not easily unnerved on the battlefield, even deep among the densest, most violent melee.
troy_dlc1_anc_mount_hip_hero_warmonger_h.localisedColourText: 这匹顽强的马即使身处最危险、最残忍的战斗中，也不会轻易退缩。

troy_main_anc_item_kronos_sickle.colourText: This very sickle was used to castrate Gaia's son-husband, Ouranos. Once his genitals were discarded in the sea, the goddess Aphrodite grew from the ocean spray.
troy_main_anc_item_kronos_sickle.localisedColourText: 盖亚的儿子兼丈夫乌拉诺斯就是被这把镰刀阉割的，他的那个东西掉在海里后，阿佛洛狄忒女神就从浪花中诞生。
troy_main_anc_item_kronos_sickle.effect: +300 food per turn|+10% to armour-piercing damage of Hero
troy_main_anc_item_kronos_sickle.localisedEffect: +300 每回合粮食收入|英雄破甲杀伤+10%

troy_dlc1_anc_mount_pen_hero_fighter_bal.colourText: This extremely-heavy chariot is best used for punching through battle lines while the Hero it bears uses their spear two-handed to cut the enemy down.
troy_dlc1_anc_mount_pen_hero_fighter_bal.localisedColourText: 这辆极重的战车最适合冲锋陷阵，车上的英雄能够双手挥舞长矛斩杀敌人。

troy_main_anc_armour_zoster_belt.colourText: This warrior's girdle-style belt, made from leather, is designed to hold their short chiton in place.
troy_main_anc_armour_zoster_belt.localisedColourText: 这条战士腰带由皮革制成，用来束住短袍。
troy_main_anc_armour_zoster_belt.effect: +2 to motivation|+5 to morale of Hero

troy_main_anc_item_minos_tablet.colourText: This clay tablet contains the spoken words of Crete's first and arguably greatest king.
troy_main_anc_item_minos_tablet.localisedColourText: 这块泥版上刻着克里特第一位、也是最伟大国王的话语。

troy_main_anc_weapon_appolo_bow.colourText: The silver bow of Apollo makes its wielder an expert marksman, to deleterious effect.
troy_main_anc_weapon_appolo_bow.localisedColourText: 阿波罗的银弓能让它的持有者变成专业而致命的射手。
troy_main_anc_weapon_appolo_bow.effect: +2 to recruit rank of missile units|+25% to missile damage of Hero
troy_main_anc_weapon_appolo_bow.localisedEffect: 远程部队征募等级+2|英雄远程杀伤+25%

troy_main_anc_item_tethis_cup.colourText: Gifted to Achilles by his mother Thetis, this ornate cup is intended for ceremonial use when sacrificing to the gods.
troy_main_anc_item_tethis_cup.localisedColourText: 这只装饰华丽的杯子是阿喀琉斯的母亲忒提斯送给他的礼物，当他向众神献祭时可以用来举行仪式。
troy_main_anc_item_tethis_cup.effect: +10% food per turn|+30 to growth in the local province
troy_main_anc_item_tethis_cup.localisedEffect: 每回合粮食收入 +10%|该行省发展+30

troy_main_anc_armour_hephestus_armour.localisedOnscreenName: 赫淮斯托斯的黄金盔甲
troy_main_anc_armour_hephestus_armour.colourText: These gleaming armour pieces were gifted to Heracles, that he might not be swept from his chosen path.
troy_main_anc_armour_hephestus_armour.localisedColourText: 这套闪耀的盔甲是赠给赫拉克勒斯的礼物，这样他就不会因自己的征程而汗流浃背。
troy_main_anc_armour_hephestus_armour.effect: +5% to missile resistance of Hero|+10 to morale of Hero
troy_main_anc_armour_hephestus_armour.localisedEffect: 英雄远程抗性+5%|英雄士气+10

troy_main_anc_item_poseidon_sceptre.colourText: This skeptron is said to have the power to repel enemy ships with a single touch from its tip.
troy_main_anc_item_poseidon_sceptre.localisedColourText: 据说，只要用这个权杖的顶端轻轻一触，就能击退敌舰。
troy_main_anc_item_poseidon_sceptre.effect: +15% food per turn|+10 to morale when fighting at sea
troy_main_anc_item_poseidon_sceptre.localisedEffect: 每回合粮食收入 +15%|海上作战时士气+10

troy_main_anc_armour_sarpedon_armour.colourText: This finely-wrought bronze scale armour is surely fit for a king, and a king of Lycia at that.
troy_main_anc_armour_sarpedon_armour.localisedColourText: 这精心打造的青铜鳞甲适合国王穿戴，特别是吕基亚的国王。
troy_main_anc_armour_sarpedon_armour.effect: +3 to armour of Hero|+3 to melee defence of Hero
troy_main_anc_armour_sarpedon_armour.localisedEffect: 英雄护甲+3|英雄近战防御+3

troy_main_anc_weapon_ancaeus_labrys.colourText: Twin blades means twice as much death can be administered in the same space of time.
troy_main_anc_weapon_ancaeus_labrys.localisedColourText: 双刃代表着能在相同的时间内造成双倍的死亡。
troy_main_anc_weapon_ancaeus_labrys.effect: +10% to armour-piercing damage of Hero|+7% to melee attack of sword, axe and club units
troy_main_anc_weapon_ancaeus_labrys.localisedEffect: 英雄破甲杀伤+10%|持剑、持斧以及持棍部队近战攻击+7%

troy_main_anc_item_bronze_diploma.colourText: This bronze tablet was given in recognition of the awardee's considerable valour in battle.
troy_main_anc_item_bronze_diploma.localisedColourText: 这块青铜板用来褒奖英勇的战士。

troy_dlc1_anc_mount_pen_hero_warmonger_h.colourText: This powerful mount has been reared for combat from the very beginning, and is unlikely to be spooked in the thick of battle.
troy_dlc1_anc_mount_pen_hero_warmonger_h.localisedColourText: 这匹强壮的坐骑专为战斗而生，在激烈的战场上也不会受到惊吓。

troy_main_anc_item_peonies_herbs.colourText: The healer Paean treated the gods themselves with a balm made from this herb, which can also calm convulsions in mortal men.
troy_main_anc_item_peonies_herbs.localisedColourText: 治疗师皮安用这种草药制成的香油治好了众神，它还能治疗凡人的痉挛。
troy_main_anc_item_peonies_herbs.effect: +5% to casualty replenishment rate of all armies

troy_main_anc_armour_odysseus_boar_helm.colourText: This antique helmet is decorated with rows of boars' tusks, which also increase its strength and ability to deflect blows.
troy_main_anc_armour_odysseus_boar_helm.localisedColourText: 这古老的头盔上装饰着成排的野猪獠牙，不但提升了它的强度，还能更好地防御攻击。
troy_main_anc_armour_odysseus_boar_helm.effect: +5 to armour of Hero|+5% to battle speed of Hero
troy_main_anc_armour_odysseus_boar_helm.localisedEffect: 英雄护甲+5|英雄战斗移速+5%

troy_dlc1_anc_mount_pen_hero_trickster_a.colourText: This speedy horse will get its rider close enough to the enemy to loose their arrows and then quickly back out of range again.
troy_dlc1_anc_mount_pen_hero_trickster_a.localisedColourText: 这匹快马可以载着骑手快速接近敌人，然后在挽弓放箭后快速拉开距离。

troy_main_anc_weapon_poseidon_trident.colourText: So powerful is the sea-god's trident, it can command the waves to the wielder's will – striking the water causes storms to erupt, whereas holding it level calms choppy waters.
troy_main_anc_weapon_poseidon_trident.localisedColourText: 海神的三叉戟蕴含无匹的神力，它可以随持用者的意愿控制海浪——击打水面会升起风暴，而保持水平则会风平浪静。
troy_main_anc_weapon_poseidon_trident.effect: +10 to armour-piercing damage during island battles

troy_main_anc_item_volcanic_glass_vessel.colourText: Captivated by the way it catches the light, the target fails to pay attention to exactly what they are drinking, with deadly consequences.
troy_main_anc_item_volcanic_glass_vessel.localisedColourText: 人们被它的光芒深深吸引，甚至没在意自己到底喝了什么。
troy_main_anc_item_volcanic_glass_vessel.effect: +3% to success chance of agent actions

troy_main_anc_item_bronze_necklace.colourText: Greed and avarice blind men to the truth of their immediate circumstances; often fatally.
troy_main_anc_item_bronze_necklace.localisedColourText: 贪欲会让人无法认清现状，而这往往会造成致命的后果。
troy_main_anc_item_bronze_necklace.effect: -6% to action cost for this agent

troy_main_anc_armour_aegis_athena.colourText: This adorned shield is inlaid with an elaborate design depicting the face of the Gorgon Medusa, sight of whom causes abject terror among the foe.
troy_main_anc_armour_aegis_athena.localisedColourText: 这面盾牌上装饰着精心设计的蛇发女妖美杜莎的面孔，她的目光会为敌人带去凄惨和恐怖。
troy_main_anc_armour_aegis_athena.effect: +5% to morale of all units when defending|+5 to melee defence of Hero
troy_main_anc_armour_aegis_athena.localisedEffect: 防御时所有部队士气+5%|英雄近战防御+5

troy_main_anc_weapon_sceptre_circe.colourText: To the delight of all who stand behind it, the enchantress' sceptre has the power to turn adversaries into harmless pigs!
troy_main_anc_weapon_sceptre_circe.localisedColourText: 让持有者无比欣喜的是，女巫的法杖能够把敌人变成无害的猪猡！
troy_main_anc_weapon_sceptre_circe.effect: +10% Increases the cost of enemy agent actions against this Hero's army|+7 to melee defence of all units in Hero's army
troy_main_anc_weapon_sceptre_circe.localisedEffect: 敌方事务官针对该英雄所在军队的行动成本增加+10%|英雄所在军队中所有部队近战防御+7

troy_adi_anc_follower_ithican_advisor.colourText: Dispatched by Odysseus, this seasoned Ithacan warrior knows all about conducting battles under the cover of darkness.
troy_adi_anc_follower_ithican_advisor.localisedColourText: 这位老练的伊萨基战士是奥德修斯派来的，他知道如何在夜色的掩护下进行战斗。
troy_adi_anc_follower_ithican_advisor.effect: Enables night battle when attacking; target cannot receive reinforcements
troy_adi_anc_follower_ithican_advisor.localisedEffect: 进攻时可选择夜战，目标将无法获得增援

troy_main_anc_item_paris_leopard.colourText: Paris' distinctive leopardskin makes him easily visible on the battlefield, which is beneficial to his men but marks him out as a target for the foe.
troy_main_anc_item_paris_leopard.localisedColourText: 帕里斯独特的豹皮让他在战场上备受瞩目，虽然便于指挥，但是也容易成为敌人的目标。
troy_main_anc_item_paris_leopard.effect: +10% to battle speed of the Hero|Grants "Stalk" specialisation to Hero
troy_main_anc_item_paris_leopard.localisedEffect: 英雄战斗移速+10%|英雄获得“潜行”特化

troy_main_anc_weapon_sword_troy.colourText: This fine bronze blade has been passed down through Priam's ancestral line into the Trojan king's courageous hands.
troy_main_anc_weapon_sword_troy.localisedColourText: 这把精美的青铜剑已经由普里阿摩斯的祖先传到了英勇的特洛伊国王手中。
troy_main_anc_weapon_sword_troy.effect: +8 to melee attack of Hero|+10% to melee attack of sword, axe and club units
troy_main_anc_weapon_sword_troy.localisedEffect: 英雄近战攻击+8|持剑、持斧以及持棍部队近战攻击+10%

troy_dlc1_anc_mount_hip_hero_trickster_a.colourText: This speedy horse will get its rider close enough to the enemy to loose their arrows and then quickly back out of range again.
troy_dlc1_anc_mount_hip_hero_trickster_a.localisedColourText: 这匹快马可以载着骑手快速接近敌人，然后在挽弓放箭后快速拉开距离。

troy_main_anc_item_hermes_talaria.colourText: "Fly, on your wings, like an eagle, fly as high as the sun."
troy_main_anc_item_hermes_talaria.localisedColourText: “飞吧，挥动你的翅膀，像一只鹰，去追逐太阳。”
troy_main_anc_item_hermes_talaria.effect: +15% to battle speed of light infantry units|+8% to battle speed of spear infantry units
troy_main_anc_item_hermes_talaria.localisedEffect: 轻步兵战斗移速+15%|持矛步兵战斗移速+8%

troy_dlc1_anc_mount_hip_hero_fighter_dis.colourText: This large, sturdy, yet swift beast is capable of carrying extra javelins for its skirmishing rider to hurl at the enemy.
troy_dlc1_anc_mount_hip_hero_fighter_dis.localisedColourText: 这只庞大、健壮而又敏捷的猛兽可以携带额外的标枪，供它背上的骑手向敌人投掷。

troy_main_anc_weapon_bronze_dagger.colourText: This dagger of bronze slips through flesh like a knife through butter.
troy_main_anc_weapon_bronze_dagger.localisedColourText: 这把青铜匕首能像切开黄油一样穿透肉体。

troy_main_anc_armour_reinforced_armour.colourText: This armour has been reinforced with leather and felt for added protection and comfort in combat.
troy_main_anc_armour_reinforced_armour.localisedColourText: 这套盔甲用皮革加固，不但能提供更好的保护，穿起来也更舒适。

troy_main_anc_armour_nestor_shield.colourText: For a warrior, this shield of pure gold is more than a mere adornment for a warrior, and will bind them closer to their lord.
troy_main_anc_armour_nestor_shield.localisedColourText: 这面纯金盾牌并不只是装饰，还能让战士们团结在君王身边。
troy_main_anc_armour_nestor_shield.effect: +5% to missile resistance of Hero|+15% to melee defence of Hero on chariot
troy_main_anc_armour_nestor_shield.localisedEffect: 英雄远程抗性+5%|英雄搭乘战车时近战防御+15%

troy_main_anc_item_aeolus_bag.colourText: The keeper of winds gave this magic bag to Odysseus, so that he might find his way home when the war is won.
troy_main_anc_item_aeolus_bag.localisedColourText: 奥德修斯从风的守护者那里得到了这个神奇的风袋，这样他就可以在战争胜利后一路顺风地返回家乡了。
troy_main_anc_item_aeolus_bag.effect: +30% to campaign movement range at sea
troy_main_anc_item_aeolus_bag.localisedEffect: 位于海上时战役地图移动距离+30%

troy_main_anc_armour_legendary_shield.colourText: This embossed shield once belonged to a great hero who has now crossed the Styx to the Underworld.
troy_main_anc_armour_legendary_shield.localisedColourText: 这面饰有雕花的盾牌曾属于一位伟大的英雄，不过他如今已渡过斯提克斯河，长眠于冥界了。

troy_main_anc_item_silver_mirror.colourText: Ownership of a mirror is often indicative of the elevated position of its owner.
troy_main_anc_item_silver_mirror.localisedColourText: 拥有一面镜子意味着主人的身份不同寻常。
troy_main_anc_item_silver_mirror.effect: +2 to motivation|+7 to morale of Hero

troy_dlc1_anc_mount_hip_hippolyta_archer.colourText: This mighty charger, specifically bred for war, is large enough to enable the Hero to shoot with greater range than the average horse.
troy_dlc1_anc_mount_hip_hippolyta_archer.localisedColourText: 这匹强大的战马专为战争而饲养，它体型庞大，可以让英雄在比平时更远的距离进行射击。

troy_main_anc_item_castor_pilos.localisedOnscreenName: 卡斯托耳与波鲁克斯之帽
troy_main_anc_item_castor_pilos.colourText: It's probably safest not to call the wearer of this skull-cap an 'egg-head'...
troy_main_anc_item_castor_pilos.localisedColourText: 最好不要管带着这个头骨做的头盔的人叫“鸡蛋头”……
troy_main_anc_item_castor_pilos.effect: The Hero gains +20%  speed in battle while on a chariot|+15 to charge of Hero on chariot
troy_main_anc_item_castor_pilos.localisedEffect: 英雄乘坐战车时战斗移速+20%|英雄搭乘战车时冲锋+15

troy_main_anc_armour_tydeus_shield.colourText: Featuring a full moon depicted against a starry sky, the tribe leader's shield is a defensive focal point for warriors to rally around.
troy_main_anc_armour_tydeus_shield.localisedColourText: 这个部落领袖的盾牌就如同使群星失色的皓月一般，成为了将士们集结的防御核心。
troy_main_anc_armour_tydeus_shield.effect: +4 to armour of all units while besieging|+4 to melee defence of Hero
troy_main_anc_armour_tydeus_shield.localisedEffect: 攻城时所有部队护甲+4|英雄近战防御+4

troy_main_anc_weapon_odysseus_bow.colourText: This large, imposing weapon, which can only be strung and fired by its owner, comes with extra ammunition to cause increased damage.
troy_main_anc_weapon_odysseus_bow.localisedColourText: 这把巨大而凶猛的武器只能由它的主人来上弦和射击，它附带有额外的弹药，能够造成更大的伤害。
troy_main_anc_weapon_odysseus_bow.effect: +20% to missile damage of Hero|+30% to missile range of Hero
troy_main_anc_weapon_odysseus_bow.localisedEffect: 英雄远程杀伤+20%|英雄射程+30%

troy_adi_anc_item_palladium.colourText: This wooden effigy of Athena, said to have fallen from heaven, no longer guards Troy from capture.
troy_adi_anc_item_palladium.localisedColourText: 传说这座雅典娜的木质雕像是从天而降的，如今它再也不能保护特洛伊不被攻占了。
troy_adi_anc_item_palladium.effect: +10% to melee defence of all units |+5% to melee attack of all spear units|-5% to fatigue in battle for all units while defending
troy_adi_anc_item_palladium.localisedEffect: 所有部队近战防御+10% |所有矛兵部队近战攻击+5%|防御时所有部队疲劳-5%

troy_main_anc_weapon_iron_dagger.colourText: Iron ensures that your blade, directed with sufficient force of course, can pierce armour to gouge the flesh beneath.
troy_main_anc_weapon_iron_dagger.localisedColourText: 铁制的刀刃加上足够的力量，就能够穿透盔甲、刺穿皮肉。
troy_main_anc_weapon_iron_dagger.effect: +7 to melee attack of Hero|+50 to melee damage of Hero
troy_main_anc_weapon_iron_dagger.localisedEffect: 英雄近战攻击+7|英雄近战杀伤+50

troy_main_anc_armour_polynices_shield.colourText: "I will turn this man into a victor in his town and ancestral city."
troy_main_anc_armour_polynices_shield.localisedColourText: “我要让他成为故乡的英雄，世代被人传颂。”
troy_main_anc_armour_polynices_shield.effect: +2 to motivation|+2 to melee defence of Hero

troy_main_anc_item_achaean_chlamys.colourText: This lightweight cape is ideal for avoiding sunburn in the punishing daytime heat, enabling daily life to continue relatively unhindered by the climate.
troy_main_anc_item_achaean_chlamys.localisedColourText: 这身轻便的斗篷很适合在酷热的天气里用来遮阳，以便减少气候对人们生活的影响。
troy_main_anc_item_achaean_chlamys.effect: +2 to happiness in the local province

troy_main_anc_weapon_heavy_iron_javelin.colourText: The latest smelting and folding techniques can produce heavier iron tips strong enough to bring down a horse and pierce the armour of its rider.
troy_main_anc_weapon_heavy_iron_javelin.localisedColourText: 最新的熔炼和锻叠技术能够打造更加沉重的铁质枪尖，足以击倒马匹并刺穿骑手的盔甲。
troy_main_anc_weapon_heavy_iron_javelin.effect: +8% to armour-piercing damage of Hero|+15% to range of javelin units in Hero's army
troy_main_anc_weapon_heavy_iron_javelin.localisedEffect: 英雄破甲杀伤+8%|英雄所在军队中标枪手部队射程+15%

troy_main_anc_armour_helm_darkness.colourText: Worn by Perseus to evade Medusa's sisters and approach the Gorgon by stealth, this helmet enshrouds the wearer in a cloak of shadows.
troy_main_anc_armour_helm_darkness.localisedColourText: 为了躲避美杜莎的姐妹并秘密接近蛇发女妖，珀耳修斯戴上了这顶头盔。
troy_main_anc_armour_helm_darkness.effect: +15% to success chance of ambushes|Enables night battle when attacking; target cannot receive reinforcements
troy_main_anc_armour_helm_darkness.localisedEffect: 伏击成功率+15%|进攻时可选择夜战，目标将无法获得增援

troy_main_anc_armour_amphiaraus_shield.colourText: Amphiaraus awesome shield was devoid of an emblem in order to symbolise the hero's strength but unwillingness to participate in the slaughter to come.
troy_main_anc_armour_amphiaraus_shield.localisedColourText: 安菲阿拉俄斯精致的盾牌上并没有任何徽记，这代表着这位英雄虽有强大的力量，却并不愿意参与这场即将到来的屠杀。
troy_main_anc_armour_amphiaraus_shield.effect: +2 to motivation|+2 to armour of Hero

troy_main_anc_item_dionysus_thyrsus.colourText: This staff of fennel, its spear-tip covered with a pine cone, belongs to the winemaking-god, who uses it both to work miracles and to fight his enemies.
troy_main_anc_item_dionysus_thyrsus.localisedColourText: 这根茴香手杖的顶端装饰着一颗松果。它是酒神的手杖，既可以用来施展神迹，也能用来敲打敌人。
troy_main_anc_item_dionysus_thyrsus.effect: +5% food per turn|+3 to happiness in the local province
troy_main_anc_item_dionysus_thyrsus.localisedEffect: 每回合粮食收入 +5%|本行省满意度+3

troy_main_anc_item_scented_oil.colourText: "You can smell the more well-off among our number long before you see them."
troy_main_anc_item_scented_oil.effect: +3% to success chance of agent actions

troy_main_anc_mount_warlord_utility_jave.colourText: This fast, light chariot is mostly used for skirmishing due to its ability to get into the action and out again at speed.
troy_main_anc_mount_warlord_utility_jave.localisedColourText: 这种快速、轻便的战车很适合用于袭扰敌军，它可以快速切入战场，也能轻易地脱离战斗。

troy_main_anc_armour_ajax_lesser_armour.colourText: You wouldn't think so, but linen arranged into padding is surprisingly effective at deflecting glancing blows.
troy_main_anc_armour_ajax_lesser_armour.localisedColourText: 你可能想不到，用亚麻布做的垫子在防御侧面攻击时其实十分有效。
troy_main_anc_armour_ajax_lesser_armour.effect: +2 to motivation|+5 to melee defence of Hero

troy_main_anc_item_wooden_lire.effect: -6% to success chance of enemy agent actions against this agent
troy_main_anc_item_wooden_lire.localisedEffect: 敌方事务官针对该事务官的行动成功率-6%

troy_main_anc_mount_pht_achilles_melee_s.colourText: This medium-weight chariot enables the Hero to stay close to the fray whilst throwing their javelins at the foe.
troy_main_anc_mount_pht_achilles_melee_s.localisedColourText: 这辆中等重量的战车可载着英雄在近距离向敌人投掷标枪。

troy_main_anc_item_seal_miletus.colourText: Miletus is among the wealthiest cities in Anatolia; it's seal ensures loyalty and the possibility of sharing in its riches.
troy_main_anc_item_seal_miletus.localisedColourText: 米利都是安那托利亚最富有的城市之一；它的印章代表着忠诚与分享财富的权利。
troy_main_anc_item_seal_miletus.effect: +40 to growth in the local province| +2 to motivation

troy_main_anc_armour_hector_shield.colourText: Mighty Hector's bronze shield is strong and heavy, befitting a warrior of distinction such as he.
troy_main_anc_armour_hector_shield.localisedColourText: 强大的赫克托耳手里的青铜盾结实又沉重，很适合他这样一位伟大的战士。
troy_main_anc_armour_hector_shield.effect: +10% to morale of all units when defending|+5 to melee defence of Hero
troy_main_anc_armour_hector_shield.localisedEffect: 防御时所有部队士气+10%|英雄近战防御+5

troy_main_anc_item_golden_necklace.colourText: Gold has many uses; among them, it buys entry to secure areas and the silence of their guards.
troy_main_anc_item_golden_necklace.localisedColourText: 黄金用途广泛。比如可以用它买通警戒区域的守卫，让他们对你视如不见。
troy_main_anc_item_golden_necklace.effect: -8% to action cost for this agent

troy_main_anc_mount_archer_trickster_bow.colourText: This large, slow chariot can carry a greater number of arrows for the Hero to fire at the enemy than is usual.
troy_main_anc_mount_archer_trickster_bow.localisedColourText: 这辆庞大、缓慢的战车能够为英雄提供更多的箭矢，供英雄向敌人射击。

troy_main_anc_follower_antenor.colourText: The highly-educated son of a Dardanian noble, Antenor is King Priam's most trusted advisor.
