troy_main_anc_follower_antenor.localisedColourText: 安忒诺耳的父亲是一位达达尼亚贵族，因此他受过良好教育，从而成为普里阿摩斯王最信赖的顾问。
troy_main_anc_follower_antenor.effect: -20% to attrition in Hero's army|Increases the success chance of stealing spoils from the fallen following a victory
troy_main_anc_follower_antenor.localisedEffect: 英雄所在军队损耗-20%|胜利后从败者身上掠取战利品的成功率增加

troy_dlc1_anc_follower_ainia.colourText: The Chersonai women were accepted in the fold of the Amazons and Ainia would have to prove her worth amongst the equals of men.
troy_dlc1_anc_follower_ainia.localisedColourText: 亚马逊人接纳了来自赫尔松的女人们，而艾妮亚必须证明自己不比任何男人逊色。

troy_dlc1_anc_mount_hip_hero_warlord_war.colourText: This extremely-heavy chariot is best used for punching through battle lines while the Hero it bears uses their spear two-handed to cut the enemy down.
troy_dlc1_anc_mount_hip_hero_warlord_war.localisedColourText: 这辆极重的战车最适合冲锋陷阵，车上的英雄能够双手挥舞长矛斩杀敌人。

troy_main_anc_item_arkeion_herb.colourText: The greater burdock root, known to all as 'arkeion', is used to seal open wounds and even clears up minor skin ailments.
troy_main_anc_item_arkeion_herb.localisedColourText: 大牛蒡的根被称作“阿克恩”，用来治疗外伤，也能治愈轻微的皮肤病。
troy_main_anc_item_arkeion_herb.effect: +5% to casualty replenishment rate of all armies

troy_main_anc_armour_hector_helmet.colourText: This conical helm is ferocious in appearance and strong of construction, featuring three layers of padding to protect the wearer.
troy_main_anc_armour_hector_helmet.localisedColourText: 这圆锥形的头盔外观惊人，结构稳固，内置三层衬垫以保护穿戴者。
troy_main_anc_armour_hector_helmet.effect: +7 to morale of all units in Hero's aura|+6 to armour of Hero
troy_main_anc_armour_hector_helmet.localisedEffect: 英雄光环范围内所有部队士气+7|英雄护甲+6

troy_main_anc_item_cretan_hat.colourText: A fine cranial adornment for Minoan people of some civic or military importance.
troy_main_anc_item_cretan_hat.localisedColourText: 地位显要的米诺斯官员或将军会佩戴这种精美的头饰。
troy_main_anc_item_cretan_hat.effect: +3 to happiness in the local province| +2 to motivation

troy_main_anc_mount_defender_quick_javel.colourText: This medium-weight chariot enables the Hero to stay close to the fray whilst throwing their javelins at the foe.
troy_main_anc_mount_defender_quick_javel.localisedColourText: 这辆中等重量的战车可载着英雄在近距离向敌人投掷标枪。

troy_main_anc_weapon_perseus_harpe.colourText: This legendary adamantine sword was gifted to Perseus so he could slay the Gorgon by cutting off her snake-infested head.
troy_main_anc_weapon_perseus_harpe.localisedColourText: 这把传说宝剑被赠予珀耳修斯，这样他就可以砍掉蛇发女妖的蛇头，从而杀掉她。
troy_main_anc_weapon_perseus_harpe.effect: +7 to melee attack of Hero|+70 to melee damage of Hero
troy_main_anc_weapon_perseus_harpe.localisedEffect: 英雄近战攻击+7|英雄近战杀伤+70

troy_main_anc_mount_sarpedon_javelin.colourText: This fast, light chariot is mostly used for skirmishing due to its ability to get into the action and out again at speed.
troy_main_anc_mount_sarpedon_javelin.localisedColourText: 这种快速、轻便的战车很适合用于袭扰敌军，它可以快速切入战场，也能轻易地脱离战斗。

troy_dlc1_anc_mount_hip_hero_warlord_uti.colourText: This large, sturdy, yet swift beast is capable of carrying extra javelins for its skirmishing rider to hurl at the enemy.
troy_dlc1_anc_mount_hip_hero_warlord_uti.localisedColourText: 这只庞大、健壮而又敏捷的猛兽可以携带额外的标枪，供它背上的骑手向敌人投掷。

troy_dlc2_anc_item_statue_artemis.colourText: It is better to be the hunter within the grace of Artemis, instead falling prey to the arrows of her followers.
troy_dlc2_anc_item_statue_artemis.localisedColourText: 最好成为阿耳忒弥斯庇护下的猎手，而不是她跟随者箭下的猎物。
troy_dlc2_anc_item_statue_artemis.effect: +1 to motivation|+10% to range of archer units

troy_main_anc_item_meaonian_chlamys.colourText: This lightweight cape is ideal for avoiding sunburn in the punishing daytime heat, enabling daily life to continue relatively unhindered by the climate.
troy_main_anc_item_meaonian_chlamys.localisedColourText: 这身轻便的斗篷很适合在酷热的天气里用来遮阳，以便减少气候对人们生活的影响。
troy_main_anc_item_meaonian_chlamys.effect: +3 to happiness in the local province

troy_main_anc_item_statue_poseidon.colourText: Drowning at sea is not a pleasant way to die, so it makes sense to show reverance to the truculent, violent lord of the storms, but at the risk of angering Apollo.
troy_main_anc_item_statue_poseidon.localisedColourText: 在海里淹死可不是什么愉快的死法，因此我们要对狂暴的风雨之神表示尊敬，但这样也会得罪阿波罗。
troy_main_anc_item_statue_poseidon.effect: -15% to attrition from traveling through deep waters| +1 to motivation

troy_adi_anc_armour_salamian_breastplate.colourText: "Fire-shaped bronze, guard the mighty hearts of giants against the swords of men."
troy_adi_anc_armour_salamian_breastplate.localisedColourText: “火焰一般的青铜啊，请保护巨人强大的心脏，不被人类的刀剑所伤。”

troy_main_anc_item_statue_aphrodite.colourText: Worship of the goddess of love should be tempered with wariness of her feud with dangerous, vengeful Hera.
troy_main_anc_item_statue_aphrodite.localisedColourText: 崇拜爱情女神要小心，因为她与危险的而记仇的赫拉十分不和。
troy_main_anc_item_statue_aphrodite.effect: +1 to motivation| +10% to battle captives taken

troy_main_anc_weapon_light_bronze_javeli.colourText: This lightweight, bronze-tipped javelin is suitable for both hunting and war.
troy_main_anc_weapon_light_bronze_javeli.localisedColourText: 这种重量轻的铜尖标枪既适合打猎也适合作战。
troy_main_anc_weapon_light_bronze_javeli.effect: +10% to range of javelin units in Hero's army
troy_main_anc_weapon_light_bronze_javeli.localisedEffect: 英雄所在军队中标枪手部队射程+10%

troy_main_anc_item_cretan_hat_feather.colourText: At this point in time, the right hat says much about the societal status of its wearer.
troy_main_anc_item_cretan_hat_feather.localisedColourText: 在这个时代，帽子是穿戴者身份地位的象征之一。
troy_main_anc_item_cretan_hat_feather.effect: +4 to happiness in the local province| +2 to motivation

troy_main_anc_item_statue_zeus.colourText: Reverance for the king of all the gods displays a willingness to hedge one's bets when it comes to divine favour.
troy_main_anc_item_statue_zeus.localisedColourText: 对万神之王的尊敬表明，在神的恩宠面前，人们更愿意两面讨好。
troy_main_anc_item_statue_zeus.effect: +1 to motivation|+10% to missile and armour-piercing missile damage of javelin units
troy_main_anc_item_statue_zeus.localisedEffect: 斗志+1|标枪部队远程伤害和远程破甲伤害+10%

troy_main_anc_mount_sarpedon_javelin_spe.colourText: This extremely-heavy chariot is best used for punching through battle lines while the Hero it bears uses their spear two-handed to cut the enemy down.
troy_main_anc_mount_sarpedon_javelin_spe.localisedColourText: 这辆极重的战车最适合冲锋陷阵，车上的英雄能够双手挥舞长矛斩杀敌人。

troy_main_anc_item_hephestus_hammer.colourText: Along with his anvil and tongs, the smith-god uses his hammer to make real the plans of gods and men.
troy_main_anc_item_hephestus_hammer.localisedColourText: 铁匠之神用铁锤配合铁砧、钳子来将众神或者人类的设计变成现实。
troy_main_anc_item_hephestus_hammer.effect: -1 to construction time of all main buildings| +2 to motivation
troy_main_anc_item_hephestus_hammer.localisedEffect: 所有核心建筑的建造时间-1|斗志+2

troy_main_anc_mount_spa_menelaus_melee.colourText: This fast, light chariot is mostly used for skirmishing due to its ability to get into the action and out again at speed.
troy_main_anc_mount_spa_menelaus_melee.localisedColourText: 这种快速、轻便的战车很适合用于袭扰敌军，它可以快速切入战场，也能轻易地脱离战斗。

troy_main_anc_weapon_minoan_relic_axe.colourText: A perfect blade with which to hack and slash and slaughter the foe before you, like the claws of Minos' deadliest bull.
troy_main_anc_weapon_minoan_relic_axe.localisedColourText: 这把完美的刀刃能够如米诺斯公牛的利爪般，轻松将你面前的敌人碎尸万段。
troy_main_anc_weapon_minoan_relic_axe.effect: +1 to motivation|+7% to melee attack of axe units
troy_main_anc_weapon_minoan_relic_axe.localisedEffect: 斗志+1|持斧部队近战攻击+7%

troy_main_anc_armour_ajax_tower.colourText: Telamon's son, mighty Ajax the Great, carries a shield "as big as a tower" into battle against the foe.
troy_main_anc_armour_ajax_tower.localisedColourText: 泰拉蒙之子大埃阿斯与敌人交战时所持的盾牌“如高塔一般巨大”。
troy_main_anc_armour_ajax_tower.effect: +10 to melee defence of Hero|+5 to melee defence of all units in Hero's army
troy_main_anc_armour_ajax_tower.localisedEffect: 英雄近战防御+10|英雄所在军队中所有部队近战防御+5

troy_main_anc_armour_memnon_armour.colourText: This fine armour was fashioned in distant Ethiopia for King Memnon, a furious warrior almost without peer.
troy_main_anc_armour_memnon_armour.localisedColourText: 这精美的铠甲是为来自遥远的埃塞俄比亚的门农王打造的，他是一位举世无双的勇猛战士。
troy_main_anc_armour_memnon_armour.effect: +2 to motivation|+3 to melee defence of Hero

troy_main_anc_mount_flesh_eating_horses.colourText: These carnivorous mounts make excellent warhorses, as they ravenously attack the foe after the charge. They are ideal for carrying a warrior armed with a long, bronze spear.
troy_main_anc_mount_flesh_eating_horses.localisedColourText: 这些优秀的战马以肉食为生，冲入敌阵后会疯狂攻击敌人，非常适合装备了青铜长矛的战士。
troy_main_anc_mount_flesh_eating_horses.effect: The Hero gains +10%  speed in battle while on a chariot
troy_main_anc_mount_flesh_eating_horses.localisedEffect: 英雄乘坐战车时战斗移速+10%

troy_main_anc_follower_eioneus.colourText: He will treat Cassandra well, if he values his life!
troy_main_anc_follower_eioneus.localisedColourText: 他必然会好好对待卡珊德拉——除非他不想活了！
troy_main_anc_follower_eioneus.effect: +10% to campaign movement range of Hero's army when on land
troy_main_anc_follower_eioneus.localisedEffect: 英雄所在军队陆地战役地图移动距离+10%

troy_main_anc_follower_personal_guard.colourText: Important individuals attract the jealousy and ire of lesser men, so oft-times, a bodyguard is needed to guarantee their personal safety.
troy_main_anc_follower_personal_guard.localisedColourText: 显赫之人难免受到卑贱者的嫉恨，因此他们必须雇佣一位贴身护卫，来保证自己的人身安全。
troy_main_anc_follower_personal_guard.effect: -10% success chance of enemy agent actions against this Hero|-1 to siege holdout time (minimum 1 turn)
troy_main_anc_follower_personal_guard.localisedEffect: 敌方事务官对该英雄的行动成功率-10%|围城坚持时间-1（至少1回合）

troy_main_anc_armour_perseus_shield.colourText: Perseus used the shield's polished interior surface to avoid looking directly at Medusa, lest he surely be turned to stone.
troy_main_anc_armour_perseus_shield.localisedColourText: 珀耳修斯依靠这面盾牌光滑的内壁反射了美杜莎的视线，避免了被石化的命运。
troy_main_anc_armour_perseus_shield.effect: +5 to armour of Hero|+10 to melee defence of Hero|The Hero frightens nearby enemy units!
troy_main_anc_armour_perseus_shield.localisedEffect: 英雄护甲+5|英雄近战防御+10|该英雄将会惊吓附近敌军！

troy_main_anc_weapon_shortbow_eros.colourText: A bow such as this would normally be too small to be deadly, but in divine hands can wound or kill to save the gods and their favourite mortals.
troy_main_anc_weapon_shortbow_eros.localisedColourText: 对普通人而言，这样的弓太小了，没什么杀伤力；但在英雄手中，它可以伤害甚至杀死众神和他们宠爱的凡人。
troy_main_anc_weapon_shortbow_eros.effect: +20% to missile damage of Hero|+10% to range of missile units in Hero's army
troy_main_anc_weapon_shortbow_eros.localisedEffect: 英雄远程杀伤+20%|英雄所在军队中远程部队射程+10%

troy_main_anc_mount_sarpedon_javelin_spe.colourText: This medium-weight chariot enables the Hero to stay close to the fray whilst throwing their javelins at the foe.
troy_main_anc_mount_sarpedon_javelin_spe.localisedColourText: 这辆中等重量的战车可载着英雄在近距离向敌人投掷标枪。

troy_main_anc_mount_aeneas_melee_spec_he.colourText: This extremely-heavy chariot is best used for punching through battle lines while the Hero it bears uses their spear two-handed to cut the enemy down.
troy_main_anc_mount_aeneas_melee_spec_he.localisedColourText: 这辆极重的战车最适合冲锋陷阵，车上的英雄能够双手挥舞长矛斩杀敌人。

troy_main_anc_mount_warlord_utility_jave.colourText: This extremely-heavy chariot is best used for punching through battle lines while the Hero it bears uses their spear two-handed to cut the enemy down.
troy_main_anc_mount_warlord_utility_jave.localisedColourText: 这辆极重的战车最适合冲锋陷阵，车上的英雄能够双手挥舞长矛斩杀敌人。

troy_main_anc_item_silver_necklace.colourText: This one's victims are captivated by the necklace's beauty and therefore blind to the overt threat to their lives.
troy_main_anc_item_silver_necklace.localisedColourText: 这个项链过于美丽，让人沉迷其中，甚至忽视了生命危险。
troy_main_anc_item_silver_necklace.effect: -7% to action cost for this agent

troy_main_anc_follower_deidamia.colourText: The beautiful daughter of King Lycomedes from the island of Skyros.
troy_main_anc_follower_deidamia.localisedColourText: 斯基罗斯岛的吕科墨得斯王的美丽女儿。

troy_dlc1_anc_mount_pen_hero_balanced_ho.colourText: This powerful mount has been reared for combat from the very beginning, and is unlikely to be spooked in the thick of battle.
troy_dlc1_anc_mount_pen_hero_balanced_ho.localisedColourText: 这匹强壮的坐骑专为战斗而生，在激烈的战场上也不会受到惊吓。

troy_main_anc_item_hermes_root.colourText: When ground and consumed, this herb grants magical protection, even against Olympian machinations.
troy_main_anc_item_hermes_root.localisedColourText: 这种药草研磨后服用，可以提供强大的魔法防护，甚至无惧奥林匹斯的阴谋。

troy_main_anc_mount_spa_menelaus_melee_s.colourText: This medium-weight chariot enables the Hero to stay close to the fray whilst throwing their javelins at the foe.
troy_main_anc_mount_spa_menelaus_melee_s.localisedColourText: 这辆中等重量的战车可载着英雄在近距离向敌人投掷标枪。

troy_main_anc_follower_ucalegon.colourText: As one of Troy's elder statesmen, Ucalegon's house is filled with a lifetime's collection of treasures.
troy_main_anc_follower_ucalegon.localisedColourText: 乌加勒贡是特洛伊的一员长老，他的屋子里堆满了平生收集的各种财宝。
troy_main_anc_follower_ucalegon.effect: +60% to treasures looted after battle| +2 to motivation

troy_main_anc_item_veil_delphi.colourText: "By the time they realise I'm not the oracle, it will be way, way too late."
troy_main_anc_item_veil_delphi.localisedColourText: “等他们明白我不是先知的时候，就已经太迟了。”
troy_main_anc_item_veil_delphi.effect: +8% to success chance of agent actions

troy_main_anc_weapon_silver_ritual_dagge.colourText: "The poor beggar thought we were worshipping Zeus right up 'till the bit where I stabbed him in the throat."
troy_main_anc_weapon_silver_ritual_dagge.localisedColourText: “这个可怜的乞丐以为我们是在崇拜宙斯，直到我刺穿他的喉咙。”
troy_main_anc_weapon_silver_ritual_dagge.effect: -15% to action cost for all agents

troy_dlc1_anc_mount_pen_penthesilea_hors.colourText: This powerful mount has been reared for combat from the very beginning, and is unlikely to be spooked in the thick of battle.
troy_dlc1_anc_mount_pen_penthesilea_hors.localisedColourText: 这匹强壮的坐骑专为战斗而生，在激烈的战场上也不会受到惊吓。

troy_main_anc_mount_archer_skirmisher_bo.colourText: This most sturdy, well-made heavy chariot is capable of bearing the Hero into combat and breaking through the toughest frontline with relative ease.
troy_main_anc_mount_archer_skirmisher_bo.localisedColourText: 这辆制作精良的重型战车坚固无比，能够载着英雄进入战斗，并轻易突破最稳固的阵线。

troy_main_anc_armour_celestial_iron_grav.colourText: Kick this one in the shins and you'll break your foot.
troy_main_anc_armour_celestial_iron_grav.localisedColourText: 要是敢踢他的小腿，那你的脚非骨折不可。
troy_main_anc_armour_celestial_iron_grav.effect: +1 to motivation|+5 to melee defence of Hero

troy_main_anc_mount_swift_horses.colourText: These excellent horses have been bred for both swiftness and strength, making them ideal for pulling lightweight chariots in battle, from which warriors can hurl heavy javelins.
troy_main_anc_mount_swift_horses.localisedColourText: 这些良驹重点培育了速度和力量，在战场上可以拉动轻型战车，而战士们可以在战车上投掷沉重的标枪。
troy_main_anc_mount_swift_horses.effect: The Hero gains +6%  speed in battle while on a chariot
troy_main_anc_mount_swift_horses.localisedEffect: 英雄乘坐战车时战斗移速+6%

troy_main_anc_item_golden_vessel.effect: +5% to success chance of agent actions

troy_main_anc_mount_hec_hector_melee.colourText: This most sturdy, well-made heavy chariot is capable of bearing the Hero into combat and breaking through the toughest frontline with relative ease.
troy_main_anc_mount_hec_hector_melee.localisedColourText: 这辆制作精良的重型战车坚固无比，能够载着英雄进入战斗，并轻易突破最稳固的阵线。

troy_main_anc_item_jason_gemstone.colourText: Sight of this dazzling jewel caused the Spartoi to fight amongst themselves for its possession instead of killing the enemy.
troy_main_anc_item_jason_gemstone.localisedColourText: 为了争夺这颗辉煌的宝石，斯巴达人放弃与敌人作战而自相残杀。
troy_main_anc_item_jason_gemstone.effect: +30% success chance to evade an ambush|-3 to siege holdout time (minimum 1 turn)
troy_main_anc_item_jason_gemstone.localisedEffect: 躲避伏击成功率+30%|围城坚持时间-3（至少1回合）

troy_main_anc_item_seal_telmessos.colourText: Anatolia's largest city has grown due to its mercantile spirit and well-protected natural harbour shielded from sight by an island at its mouth.
troy_main_anc_item_seal_telmessos.localisedColourText: 得益于重商精神和岛屿拱卫的良港，这里发展成为安那托利亚最大的城市。
troy_main_anc_item_seal_telmessos.effect: -20% to construction cost of all temple buildings|-20% to recruitment cost of all agents
troy_main_anc_item_seal_telmessos.localisedEffect: 所有神庙建筑建造成本-20%|所有事务官征募花费-20%

troy_main_anc_armour_achilles_shield.colourText: This golden shield, adorned with constellations in lead, copper and gold, also depicts scenes of what is yet to come.
troy_main_anc_armour_achilles_shield.localisedColourText: 这面金盾上有铅、铜和金制的星座装饰，还刻画了一些关于未来的画面。
troy_main_anc_armour_achilles_shield.effect: +5 to armour of all units with shields|+6 to morale when defending
troy_main_anc_armour_achilles_shield.localisedEffect: 所有持盾部队护甲+5|防御时士气+6

troy_main_anc_item_golden_cup.colourText: "The king himself gave me this, you know, for services on campaign."
troy_main_anc_item_golden_cup.localisedColourText: “这是国王为了奖赏我在战争中立下的功勋而亲赐给我的。”

troy_main_anc_follower_mimas.colourText: The son of Amycus and Theano has proven to be a loyal companion to brave, adventurous Aeneas on his travels.
troy_main_anc_follower_mimas.localisedColourText: 在勇敢而大胆的埃涅阿斯的旅途中，阿密科斯与西雅娜的儿子成为了他忠实的同伴。
troy_main_anc_follower_mimas.effect: +50% to treasures looted after battle| +2 to motivation

troy_dlc1_anc_mount_hip_hero_killer_hors.colourText: This hardy breed are not easily unnerved on the battlefield, even deep among the densest, most violent melee.
troy_dlc1_anc_mount_hip_hero_killer_hors.localisedColourText: 这匹顽强的马即使身处最危险、最残忍的战斗中，也不会轻易退缩。

troy_main_anc_armour_heavy_armour.colourText: A thick, heavy cuirass and greaves, for the consummate warrior-about-Crete.
troy_main_anc_armour_heavy_armour.localisedColourText: 这套厚重的胸甲是为最强大的克里特战士打造的。

troy_main_anc_item_dorian_himation.colourText: Worn over the kithon or peplos tunic, the himation is a heavier garment than other cloaks, for wearing at night or during the winter months.
troy_main_anc_item_dorian_himation.localisedColourText: 长袍是穿在宽袍或大披肩外面的衣物，比其他的斗篷要重一些，主要适用于夜晚和冬季。
troy_main_anc_item_dorian_himation.effect: +2 to motivation|+4 to diplomatic relations with the Danaans (Achaeans, Aeolians, Dorians, Ionians)
troy_main_anc_item_dorian_himation.localisedEffect: 斗志+2|与达南人（亚该亚人、伊奥利亚人、多里安人、爱奥尼亚人）的外交关系+4

troy_main_anc_weapon_heavy_bronze_javeli.colourText: This bronze-tipped javelin is suitable for hunting larger beasts and taking down mounted opponents on the battlefield.
troy_main_anc_weapon_heavy_bronze_javeli.localisedColourText: 这种铜尖标枪适合猎杀大型野兽或是在战场上击杀骑兵。
troy_main_anc_weapon_heavy_bronze_javeli.effect: +15% to range of javelin units in Hero's army
troy_main_anc_weapon_heavy_bronze_javeli.localisedEffect: 英雄所在军队中标枪手部队射程+15%

troy_dlc1_anc_mount_hip_hero_warlord_uti.colourText: This most sturdy, well-made heavy chariot is capable of bearing the Hero into combat and breaking through the toughest frontline with relative ease.
troy_dlc1_anc_mount_hip_hero_warlord_uti.localisedColourText: 这辆制作精良的重型战车坚固无比，能够载着英雄进入战斗，并轻易突破最稳固的阵线。

troy_main_anc_item_silver_diploma.colourText: This silver tablet was awarded to a noble warrior following many great victories in the field.
troy_main_anc_item_silver_diploma.localisedColourText: 这块银版被用来表彰为国家立下汗马功劳的高贵战士。

troy_main_anc_item_polydamna_herb.colourText: The Egyptian 'forgetfulness drug' is so powerful it can even hold back the pain of bereavement.
troy_main_anc_item_polydamna_herb.localisedColourText: 埃及的“健忘药”非常有效，甚至可以抑制丧亲之痛。
troy_main_anc_item_polydamna_herb.effect: Happiness: +6|+5% to casualty replenishment rate of units in Hero's army
troy_main_anc_item_polydamna_herb.localisedEffect: 满意度: +6|英雄所在军队补员速率+5%

troy_adi_anc_weapon_tydeus_sword.colourText: Tydeus' exquisitely-crafted sword, said to be the work of Hephaestus himself, bears the designs of a lion and a boar.
troy_adi_anc_weapon_tydeus_sword.localisedColourText: 提丢斯那做工精美的宝剑据说是赫淮斯托斯本尊的作品，上面装饰着一只狮子和一只野猪。
troy_adi_anc_weapon_tydeus_sword.effect: +10% to morale of own units|+10 to melee attack of Hero
troy_adi_anc_weapon_tydeus_sword.localisedEffect: 己方部队士气+10%|英雄近战攻击+10

troy_main_anc_mount_fighter_disruptor_ja.colourText: This medium-weight chariot enables the Hero to stay close to the fray whilst throwing their javelins at the foe.
troy_main_anc_mount_fighter_disruptor_ja.localisedColourText: 这辆中等重量的战车可载着英雄在近距离向敌人投掷标枪。

troy_main_anc_item_cyclopean_stone.colourText: Reclaimed from the once-mighty walls of a razed settlement, this boulder must've been hauled into place by Cyclopes, for only they would've had the required strength.
troy_main_anc_item_cyclopean_stone.localisedColourText: 这块巨石是从一座如今已被夷为平地的堡垒的墙壁上拿下来的。当年运送这块石头的一定是独眼巨人库克罗普斯吧，否则又有谁会有这么大的力气呢？
troy_main_anc_item_cyclopean_stone.effect: -2 to construction time of all main buildings
troy_main_anc_item_cyclopean_stone.localisedEffect: 所有核心建筑的建造时间-2

troy_main_anc_mount_warlord_warmonger_me.colourText: This medium-weight chariot enables the Hero to stay close to the fray whilst throwing their javelins at the foe.
troy_main_anc_mount_warlord_warmonger_me.localisedColourText: 这辆中等重量的战车可载着英雄在近距离向敌人投掷标枪。

troy_main_anc_mount_pht_achilles_melee_s.colourText: This extremely-heavy chariot is best used for punching through battle lines while the Hero it bears uses their spear two-handed to cut the enemy down.
troy_main_anc_mount_pht_achilles_melee_s.localisedColourText: 这辆极重的战车最适合冲锋陷阵，车上的英雄能够双手挥舞长矛斩杀敌人。

troy_main_anc_item_veil_dodona.colourText: "The idiot mistook me for an oracle, to his great cost, I may add!"
troy_main_anc_item_veil_dodona.localisedColourText: “那个白痴误以为我是先知，他为此付出了沉重的代价！”
troy_main_anc_item_veil_dodona.effect: +5% to success chance of agent actions

troy_main_anc_item_oenones_ring.colourText: The maiden herself did see the anguish of the young prince and bade him take her ring, as a fleeting memory of the Idan nymph.
troy_main_anc_item_oenones_ring.localisedColourText: 少女眼见年轻的王子很是痛苦，便让他拿走戒指，当作对伊达仙女的片刻回忆。
troy_main_anc_item_oenones_ring.effect: -1 turns to recovery time for Heroes when wounded |+25% to hitpoints of Hero
troy_main_anc_item_oenones_ring.localisedEffect: 英雄受伤后恢复回合数-1 |英雄生命值+25%

troy_main_anc_item_achaean_himation.colourText: Worn over the kithon or peplos tunic, the himation is a heavier garment than other cloaks, for wearing at night or during the winter months.
troy_main_anc_item_achaean_himation.localisedColourText: 长袍是穿在宽袍或大披肩外面的衣物，比其他的斗篷要重一些，主要适用于夜晚和冬季。
troy_main_anc_item_achaean_himation.effect: +2 to motivation|+10 to diplomatic relations with the Danaans (Achaeans, Aeolians, Dorians, Ionians)
troy_main_anc_item_achaean_himation.localisedEffect: 斗志+2|与达南人（亚该亚人、伊奥利亚人、多里安人、爱奥尼亚人）的外交关系+10

troy_main_anc_weapon_leaden_spear.effect: +6 to melee attack of Hero|+70 to melee damage of Hero against spear units
troy_main_anc_weapon_leaden_spear.localisedEffect: 英雄近战攻击+6|英雄对矛兵部队造成的近战伤害+70

troy_main_anc_armour_rhesus_armour.colourText: Though Rhesos may lose his horses and indeed even his life, they shall not take his wondrous golden armour.
troy_main_anc_armour_rhesus_armour.localisedColourText: 尽管瑞索斯失去了他的马匹和性命，敌人们却无法夺走他华丽的金甲。
troy_main_anc_armour_rhesus_armour.effect: +2 to motivation|+2 to armour of Hero

troy_dlc1_anc_mount_pen_hero_skirmisher_.colourText: This mighty charger, specifically bred for war, is large enough to enable the Hero to shoot with greater range than the average horse.
troy_dlc1_anc_mount_pen_hero_skirmisher_.localisedColourText: 这匹强大的战马专为战争而饲养，它体型庞大，可以让英雄在比平时更远的距离进行射击。

troy_main_anc_weapon_deucalion_aor.colourText: The sword which conquered central Greece, wielded by the warrior Deucalion to drive the sixth generation of Pelasgians from Thessaly.
troy_main_anc_weapon_deucalion_aor.localisedColourText: 这是征服希腊中部的利剑，勇士丢卡利翁拿着它将第六代佩拉斯吉人逐出塞萨利。

troy_main_anc_weapon_decorated_dagger.colourText: "Very nice piece. It's almost a shame to scuff it up by using it."
troy_main_anc_weapon_decorated_dagger.localisedColourText: “太漂亮了。要是用坏了多可惜啊。”
troy_main_anc_weapon_decorated_dagger.effect: +8 to melee attack of Hero|+5 to influence

troy_dlc1_anc_mount_pen_hero_killer_hors.colourText: This hardy breed are not easily unnerved on the battlefield, even deep among the densest, most violent melee.
troy_dlc1_anc_mount_pen_hero_killer_hors.localisedColourText: 这匹顽强的马即使身处最危险、最残忍的战斗中，也不会轻易退缩。

troy_main_anc_mount_fighter_balanced_mel.colourText: This most sturdy, well-made heavy chariot is capable of bearing the Hero into combat and breaking through the toughest frontline with relative ease.
troy_main_anc_mount_fighter_balanced_mel.localisedColourText: 这辆制作精良的重型战车坚固无比，能够载着英雄进入战斗，并轻易突破最稳固的阵线。

troy_main_anc_mount_warlord_warmonger_me.colourText: This fast, light chariot is mostly used for skirmishing due to its ability to get into the action and out again at speed.
troy_main_anc_mount_warlord_warmonger_me.localisedColourText: 这种快速、轻便的战车很适合用于袭扰敌军，它可以快速切入战场，也能轻易地脱离战斗。

troy_main_anc_mount_warlord_warmonger_me.colourText: This extremely-heavy chariot is best used for punching through battle lines while the Hero it bears uses their spear two-handed to cut the enemy down.
troy_main_anc_mount_warlord_warmonger_me.localisedColourText: 这辆极重的战车最适合冲锋陷阵，车上的英雄能够双手挥舞长矛斩杀敌人。

troy_main_anc_item_bronze_mirror.colourText: Possession of a luxury item such as this indicates that its owner has a degree of status.
troy_main_anc_item_bronze_mirror.localisedColourText: 拥有像这样的奢侈品表明此人有一定的社会地位。
troy_main_anc_item_bronze_mirror.effect: +2 to motivation|+5 to morale of Hero

troy_dlc1_anc_mount_pen_hero_balanced_ho.colourText: This hardy breed are not easily unnerved on the battlefield, even deep among the densest, most violent melee.
troy_dlc1_anc_mount_pen_hero_balanced_ho.localisedColourText: 这匹顽强的马即使身处最危险、最残忍的战斗中，也不会轻易退缩。

troy_main_anc_armour_odysseus_boar_tusk_.colourText: The craftsman took a leather helmet and thickly studded it with boar's teeth. The result is a masterpiece.
troy_main_anc_armour_odysseus_boar_tusk_.localisedColourText: 工匠在一顶皮盔上嵌上密密麻麻的野猪牙，造就了一件杰作。
troy_main_anc_armour_odysseus_boar_tusk_.effect: Increases the aura strength of this Hero|+8 to armour of Hero|+8 to melee defence of Hero
troy_main_anc_armour_odysseus_boar_tusk_.localisedEffect: 增加这位英雄的光环效果强度|英雄护甲+8|英雄近战防御+8

troy_main_anc_armour_hippolyta_girdle.effect: +400 to experience of all units per turn|+70 to melee damage of Hero
troy_main_anc_armour_hippolyta_girdle.localisedEffect: 所有部队每回合获得经验值+400|英雄近战杀伤+70

troy_main_anc_follower_delos_priestess.colourText: In the evenings she sings ancient tunes in praise of the gods.
troy_main_anc_follower_delos_priestess.localisedColourText: 夜幕降临时，她便唱起古老的歌谣赞美众神。
troy_main_anc_follower_delos_priestess.effect: +20% to ammunition of all missile units|+10% to morale of own units|+5% to missile damage of own missile units
troy_main_anc_follower_delos_priestess.localisedEffect: 所有远程部队矢石容量+20%|己方部队士气+10%|己方远程部队的远程伤害+5%

troy_dlc1_anc_mount_hip_hero_balanced_ho.colourText: This hardy breed are not easily unnerved on the battlefield, even deep among the densest, most violent melee.
troy_dlc1_anc_mount_hip_hero_balanced_ho.localisedColourText: 这匹顽强的马即使身处最危险、最残忍的战斗中，也不会轻易退缩。

troy_main_anc_item_aeolian_kithon.colourText: This linen or wool cloak, made from a single rectangle of cloth, is worn draped across the body and is fastened at the shoulder with a pin or clasp.
troy_main_anc_item_aeolian_kithon.localisedColourText: 斗篷通常是由一整块亚麻布或羊毛制成，穿戴时垂下来遮盖住全身，并在肩膀处用别针或扣子固定。

troy_main_anc_mount_paris_bow_sharpshoot.colourText: This very fast, very light chariot is the perfect platform from which the Hero can shoot the enemy dead in their tracks.
troy_main_anc_mount_paris_bow_sharpshoot.localisedColourText: 这辆轻便快捷的战车是英雄射杀敌人的完美平台。

troy_main_anc_armour_ajax_belt.colourText: This elaborate leather belt painted a vivid red may be gifted by Ajax to an opponent after drawing a duel.
troy_main_anc_armour_ajax_belt.localisedColourText: 这精心制作的鲜红色皮带可能是埃阿斯在一场决斗之后赠送给对手的。
troy_main_anc_armour_ajax_belt.effect: +5% to missile resistance of Hero|+5% to missile resistance of shielded infantry units in Hero's army
troy_main_anc_armour_ajax_belt.localisedEffect: 英雄远程抗性+5%|英雄所在军队中持盾步兵远程抗性+5%

troy_main_anc_mount_defender_tank_melee_.colourText: This extremely-heavy chariot is best used for punching through battle lines while the Hero it bears uses their spear two-handed to cut the enemy down.
troy_main_anc_mount_defender_tank_melee_.localisedColourText: 这辆极重的战车最适合冲锋陷阵，车上的英雄能够双手挥舞长矛斩杀敌人。

troy_main_anc_item_golden_fleece.colourText: The fleece of a golden-winged ram sired of Poseidon is a symbol of both the authority and prosperity of its wearer.
troy_main_anc_item_golden_fleece.localisedColourText: 波塞冬所育的金羊之毛象征着佩戴者的权威和昌盛。
troy_main_anc_item_golden_fleece.effect: -15% to upkeep cost of all units|+10% to all resources
troy_main_anc_item_golden_fleece.localisedEffect: 所有部队维护费-15%|所有资源+10%

troy_main_anc_weapon_long_iron_dory.colourText: Used two-handed, this longer, wood-shafted but iron-tipped spear also has an iron butt-spike for bracing against the ground to withstand a determined charge.
troy_main_anc_weapon_long_iron_dory.localisedColourText: 这种较长的木杆铁尖长矛需要双手使用，矛尾由铁打造，将其插入大地能够抵抗猛烈的冲锋。
troy_main_anc_weapon_long_iron_dory.effect: +8% to melee attack of all spear units
troy_main_anc_weapon_long_iron_dory.localisedEffect: 所有矛兵部队近战攻击+8%

troy_main_anc_armour_agamemnon_shield.colourText: This shield of iron and lead, decorated with Medusa's likeness, cannot turn opponents to stone, but is a terrifying sight nonetheless.
troy_main_anc_armour_agamemnon_shield.localisedColourText: 这面盾牌由铁和铅制成，上面装饰着美杜莎的画像，虽然无法石化敌人，但这可怖的面孔也足以让敌人心生恐惧。
troy_main_anc_armour_agamemnon_shield.effect: This hero is resistant to flanking|+4 to armour of Hero
troy_main_anc_armour_agamemnon_shield.localisedEffect: 此英雄可抵抗包抄|英雄护甲+4

troy_main_anc_item_frankincense.colourText: "Thanks very much for the gold and the frankincense, but don't worry too much about the myrrh next time."
troy_main_anc_item_frankincense.localisedColourText: “感谢您带来的黄金和乳香，不过下次请少带点没药。”
troy_main_anc_item_frankincense.effect: +4% to success chance of agent actions

troy_main_anc_item_ivory_vessel.colourText: "It's probably too good for work-use, but I do find it distracts men from their own poisoning."
troy_main_anc_item_ivory_vessel.localisedColourText: “虽然用它来工作有点糟蹋东西，但是我发现它确实能让人们忽略自己中毒的问题。”
troy_main_anc_item_ivory_vessel.effect: +4% to success chance of agent actions

troy_main_anc_follower_young_servant.colourText: Great warriors may keep a youthful apprentice around to assist with the daily duties of various kinds.
troy_main_anc_follower_young_servant.localisedColourText: 伟大的战士们可以带一名年轻的学徒，帮他们完成日常所需的各种任务。
troy_main_anc_follower_young_servant.effect: -5% to upkeep cost of all units in Hero's army
troy_main_anc_follower_young_servant.localisedEffect: 英雄所在军队内所有部队维护费-5%

troy_dlc1_anc_mount_hip_hero_warmonger_h.colourText: This powerful mount has been reared for combat from the very beginning, and is unlikely to be spooked in the thick of battle.
troy_dlc1_anc_mount_hip_hero_warmonger_h.localisedColourText: 这匹强壮的坐骑专为战斗而生，在激烈的战场上也不会受到惊吓。

troy_dlc1_anc_mount_pen_hero_archer_tric.colourText: This large, slow chariot can carry a greater number of arrows for the Hero to fire at the enemy than is usual.
troy_dlc1_anc_mount_pen_hero_archer_tric.localisedColourText: 这辆庞大、缓慢的战车能够为英雄提供更多的箭矢，供英雄向敌人射击。

troy_main_anc_item_triton_horn.colourText: Summon the storms, ravage the land.
troy_main_anc_item_triton_horn.effect: -20% to attrition in deep sea waters|+10% to campaign movement range at sea
troy_main_anc_item_triton_horn.localisedEffect: 深海损耗-20%|位于海上时战役地图移动距离+10%

troy_adi_anc_armour_salamian_helmet.colourText: "The massive helm sat on his head like a fortress, letting naught through but his battle-hungry gaze."
troy_adi_anc_armour_salamian_helmet.localisedColourText: “他头上那巨大的头盔仿佛堡垒一般，除了渴望战斗的目光之外，其他都被遮了个严严实实。”
troy_adi_anc_armour_salamian_helmet.effect: +10 to melee defence of Hero|+5 to morale of Hero
troy_adi_anc_armour_salamian_helmet.localisedEffect: 英雄近战防御+10|英雄士气+5

troy_main_anc_armour_legendary_armour.colourText: An elaborate cuirass of interlocking scales and plates - armour that once belonged to a luminary hero of the age, in fact.
troy_main_anc_armour_legendary_armour.localisedColourText: 这精湛的胸甲是由连在一起的板和鳞片制成的。实际上，它曾经是一位当世杰出的英雄所穿的铠甲。
troy_main_anc_armour_legendary_armour.effect: +6 to armour of Hero|+5 to melee defence of Hero
troy_main_anc_armour_legendary_armour.localisedEffect: 英雄护甲+6|英雄近战防御+5

troy_main_anc_armour_odysseus_night_helm.colourText: This leather helmet is padded with felt for comfort and warmth when the wearer is abroad on night-time raids.
troy_main_anc_armour_odysseus_night_helm.localisedColourText: 这皮制头盔里填充着毛毡，以便在进行夜袭时让佩戴者觉得舒适而温暖。
troy_main_anc_armour_odysseus_night_helm.effect: +2 to melee defence of Hero|+12 to charge of Hero
troy_main_anc_armour_odysseus_night_helm.localisedEffect: 英雄近战防御+2|英雄冲锋+12

troy_main_anc_item_seal_gla.colourText: Gla's ruler commands the loyalty and respect due to the king of such a large, well-ordered city.
troy_main_anc_item_seal_gla.localisedColourText: 面对统治着规模庞大、秩序井然城市的国王，格拉的统治者献上了自己的忠诚和尊敬。
troy_main_anc_item_seal_gla.effect: -4% to recruitment cost of missile units in Hero's army
troy_main_anc_item_seal_gla.localisedEffect: 英雄所在军队远程部队征募花费-4%

troy_main_anc_mount_pedasos.colourText: Amazingly for a mortal steed, Pedasos – captured by Achilles following his defeat of Eetion – can even keep up with divine horses when pulling a light Trojan chariot carrying a spear-armed hero.
troy_main_anc_mount_pedasos.localisedColourText: 阿喀琉斯击败伊蒂翁后捕获的佩达索斯虽不过是凡间之马，却是速度惊人，拉着载有持矛英雄的轻型特洛伊战车时都能跟神马并驾齐驱。
troy_main_anc_mount_pedasos.effect: The Hero gains +12%  speed in battle while on a chariot
troy_main_anc_mount_pedasos.localisedEffect: 英雄乘坐战车时战斗移速+12%

troy_main_anc_olive_branch.colourText: Whether offered via statecraft or following a bloody victory, the olive branch remains a symbol of peace between the tribes of men.
troy_main_anc_olive_branch.localisedColourText: 无论在治国理政之时还是在血战胜利之后，橄榄枝都是人们之间和平的象征。

troy_dlc1_anc_mount_pen_hero_killer_hors.colourText: This powerful mount has been reared for combat from the very beginning, and is unlikely to be spooked in the thick of battle.
troy_dlc1_anc_mount_pen_hero_killer_hors.localisedColourText: 这匹强壮的坐骑专为战斗而生，在激烈的战场上也不会受到惊吓。

troy_main_anc_item_hermes_sceptre.colourText: The messenger's skeptron is a 'magic wand' of sorts, used to both bring peace between favourites and cause mischief between rivals.
troy_main_anc_item_hermes_sceptre.localisedColourText: 信使权杖就像一根“魔杖”，既可以在友善势力间带来和平，也可以在敌对势力间制造事端。
troy_main_anc_item_hermes_sceptre.effect: +40 to growth in the local province| +2 to motivation

troy_main_anc_item_silver_box.colourText: Presented to this hero in the great hall itself, in recognition for their tremendous valour on the field of battle.
troy_main_anc_item_silver_box.localisedColourText: 在大厅中授予这位英雄，表彰他们在战场上的英勇无畏。

troy_main_anc_weapon_hector_sword.colourText: This silver-encrusted blade belongs to Hector of Troy, but may be exchanged with an opponent after drawing a duel.
troy_main_anc_weapon_hector_sword.localisedColourText: 这把镶银剑属于特洛伊的赫克托耳，不过或许在决斗之后与对手交换了武器。
troy_main_anc_weapon_hector_sword.effect: +8 to melee attack of Hero|+70 to melee damage of Hero against sword units
troy_main_anc_weapon_hector_sword.localisedEffect: 英雄近战攻击+8|英雄对剑兵部队造成的近战伤害+70

troy_dlc1_anc_mount_hip_hero_warlord_uti.colourText: This fast mount is suitable for bearing a skirmisher within range and then expeditiously back to a safe distance.
troy_dlc1_anc_mount_hip_hero_warlord_uti.localisedColourText: 这匹坐骑速度飞快，可以带着突袭者迅速地撤退到安全距离。

troy_main_anc_mount_myc_agamemnon_javeli.colourText: This medium-weight chariot enables the Hero to stay close to the fray whilst throwing their javelins at the foe.
troy_main_anc_mount_myc_agamemnon_javeli.localisedColourText: 这辆中等重量的战车可载着英雄在近距离向敌人投掷标枪。

troy_main_anc_bridle_of_pegasus.colourText: Gifted to the famed monster-slayer by Athena herself, this bridle enabled Bellerophon to tame the mythical Pegasus.
troy_main_anc_bridle_of_pegasus.localisedColourText: 雅典娜亲手将这条缰绳赠给了著名的英雄柏勒洛丰，让他能够驯服天马珀伽索斯。
troy_main_anc_bridle_of_pegasus.effect: +10% to battle speed for cavalry units

troy_main_anc_item_statue_hera.colourText: Zeus' divine consort looks after marriages, family and childbirth, but beware, as her longstanding feud with Aphrodite has never been resolved…
troy_main_anc_item_statue_hera.localisedColourText: 宙斯的天后掌管着婚姻、家庭和生育，但要注意，她与阿佛洛狄忒的宿怨从未消弭……
troy_main_anc_item_statue_hera.effect: +50 to growth in the local province| +1 to motivation

troy_main_anc_pegasus.colourText: This figurine represents Poseidon's pure white sire – perhaps its keeper will be lifted to the heavens too, following a life of daring adventure?
troy_main_anc_pegasus.localisedColourText: 这座雕像象征着波塞冬的纯白色飞马——或许其拥有者在经历了传奇的一生后，也能升入天堂？

troy_main_anc_armour_bronze_zoster_belt.colourText: This more elaborate leather girdle is decorated with bronze plates, indicating the wearer's social status.
troy_main_anc_armour_bronze_zoster_belt.localisedColourText: 这做工精巧的皮革腰带上装饰着青铜盘，体现出穿戴者的社会地位。
troy_main_anc_armour_bronze_zoster_belt.effect: +2 to motivation|+6 to morale of Hero

troy_main_anc_item_young_mule.colourText: Such beasts, young and strong, are not yet broken by a lifetime of burden.
troy_main_anc_item_young_mule.localisedColourText: 年轻强壮的牲畜，还没有被繁重的工作压垮。
troy_main_anc_item_young_mule.effect: +8% to campaign movement range of host army
troy_main_anc_item_young_mule.localisedEffect: 己方军队战役地图移动距离+8%

troy_dlc1_anc_mount_hip_hero_killer_hors.colourText: This powerful mount has been reared for combat from the very beginning, and is unlikely to be spooked in the thick of battle.
troy_dlc1_anc_mount_hip_hero_killer_hors.localisedColourText: 这匹强壮的坐骑专为战斗而生，在激烈的战场上也不会受到惊吓。

troy_main_anc_weapon_thanatos_sword.colourText: The death-god does not use his sword to fight, but instead to cut the hair of the dead to release their souls from their mortal bodies.
troy_main_anc_weapon_thanatos_sword.localisedColourText: 死神的剑并不是用来战斗的，而是用来剪断死者的头发，好让他们的灵魂脱离肉体。
troy_main_anc_weapon_thanatos_sword.effect: -6% to morale of all enemy units| +2 to motivation
troy_main_anc_weapon_thanatos_sword.localisedEffect: 所有敌方部队士气-6%|斗志+2

troy_dlc1_anc_mount_hip_hero_fighter_dis.colourText: This most sturdy, well-made heavy chariot is capable of bearing the Hero into combat and breaking through the toughest frontline with relative ease.
troy_dlc1_anc_mount_hip_hero_fighter_dis.localisedColourText: 这辆制作精良的重型战车坚固无比，能够载着英雄进入战斗，并轻易突破最稳固的阵线。

troy_dlc1_anc_mount_pen_hero_trickster_a.colourText: This mighty charger, specifically bred for war, is large enough to enable the Hero to shoot with greater range than the average horse.
troy_dlc1_anc_mount_pen_hero_trickster_a.localisedColourText: 这匹强大的战马专为战争而饲养，它体型庞大，可以让英雄在比平时更远的距离进行射击。

troy_main_anc_bellerophon_bow.colourText: Wield this bow and your quarry will be like the Chimera, with you the dogged hunter forever at its heels.
troy_main_anc_bellerophon_bow.localisedColourText: 挥动这张弓，你的猎物就将如同客迈拉，你永远都能追猎到它。
troy_main_anc_bellerophon_bow.effect: +6% to battle speed of all units|+20% to reload skill of Hero
troy_main_anc_bellerophon_bow.localisedEffect: 所有部队战斗移速+6%|英雄装填技能+20%

troy_main_anc_weapon_lead_arrows.colourText: Punch harder if you wish to pierce armour.
troy_main_anc_weapon_lead_arrows.localisedColourText: 要想刺穿盔甲，就得更用力。
troy_main_anc_weapon_lead_arrows.effect: +9% to armour-piercing damage of missile units in Hero's army
troy_main_anc_weapon_lead_arrows.localisedEffect: 英雄所在军队远程部队破甲伤害+9%

troy_main_anc_item_minoan_relic_figurine.colourText: Be like the bull in the field in springtime - hungry and fresh and filled with life's true purpose.
troy_main_anc_item_minoan_relic_figurine.localisedColourText: 要如春日田野中的公牛——渴求、抖擞，饱含生命的真谛。

troy_main_anc_mount_fighter_killer_melee.colourText: This most sturdy, well-made heavy chariot is capable of bearing the Hero into combat and breaking through the toughest frontline with relative ease.
troy_main_anc_mount_fighter_killer_melee.localisedColourText: 这辆制作精良的重型战车坚固无比，能够载着英雄进入战斗，并轻易突破最稳固的阵线。

troy_main_anc_weapon_leaded_copper_arrow.colourText: "The lead gets into the blood, you know. Very nasty."
troy_main_anc_weapon_leaded_copper_arrow.localisedColourText: “你知道吗，铅会溶入血液。很可怕的。”
troy_main_anc_weapon_leaded_copper_arrow.effect: +10% to missile damage of own missile units
troy_main_anc_weapon_leaded_copper_arrow.localisedEffect: 己方远程部队的远程伤害+10%

troy_main_anc_armour_aeneas_shield.colourText: Aeneas carries a bronze shield to protect his person during the violence of the fray.
troy_main_anc_armour_aeneas_shield.localisedColourText: 埃涅阿斯带着一面青铜盾，用来在混战中保护自己。
troy_main_anc_armour_aeneas_shield.effect: +5% to morale of spear units|+3 to melee defence of Hero
troy_main_anc_armour_aeneas_shield.localisedEffect: 持矛部队士气+5%|英雄近战防御+3

troy_dlc1_anc_mount_pen_hero_warmonger_h.colourText: This hardy breed are not easily unnerved on the battlefield, even deep among the densest, most violent melee.
troy_dlc1_anc_mount_pen_hero_warmonger_h.localisedColourText: 这匹顽强的马即使身处最危险、最残忍的战斗中，也不会轻易退缩。

troy_main_anc_mount_odysseus_bow.colourText: This light chariot will keep the Hero mobile on the battlefield, but is still strong enough to be used as an archery platform.
troy_main_anc_mount_odysseus_bow.localisedColourText: 这辆轻型战车将使英雄在战场上保持机动性，并且也足够坚固，可以用作射箭平台。

troy_main_anc_weapon_light_iron_javelin.colourText: Although still in its infancy, iron is generally stronger than bronze, and can bend and break it when struck directly with sufficient force.
troy_main_anc_weapon_light_iron_javelin.localisedColourText: 虽然铸铁工艺还很原始，但一般而言，铁的硬度都比青铜要高。虽说如此，要是用足够的力量去捶打，铁也是可以弯曲并折断的。
troy_main_anc_weapon_light_iron_javelin.effect: +4% to armour-piercing damage of Hero|+20% to range of javelin units in Hero's army
troy_main_anc_weapon_light_iron_javelin.localisedEffect: 英雄破甲杀伤+4%|英雄所在军队中标枪手部队射程+20%

troy_main_anc_item_maeonian_kithon.colourText: This linen or wool cloak, made from a single rectangle of cloth, is worn draped across the body and is fastened at the shoulder with a pin or clasp.
troy_main_anc_item_maeonian_kithon.localisedColourText: 斗篷通常是由一整块亚麻布或羊毛制成，穿戴时垂下来遮盖住全身，并在肩膀处用别针或扣子固定。

troy_dlc1_anc_follower_hippolytos.colourText: It takes courage and patience for a man to survive in the Amazon Society.
troy_dlc1_anc_follower_hippolytos.localisedColourText: 一个男人若想在亚马逊社会中生存，勇气和耐心必不可少。

troy_hep_anc_item_statue_hephaestus.colourText: Heroism and courage can only go so far without the support of Olympus' blacksmith, his blessing ensuring that shield and spear will not break.
troy_hep_anc_item_statue_hephaestus.localisedColourText: 空有英雄气概和勇气，却没有奥林匹斯山的铁匠的支持，勇士也走不了多远。有了铁匠之神的祝福，英雄们的长矛和盾牌才不会破碎。
troy_hep_anc_item_statue_hephaestus.effect: +10% to armour-piercing damage of melee units| +1 to motivation
troy_hep_anc_item_statue_hephaestus.localisedEffect: 近战部队破甲伤害+10%|斗志+1

troy_main_anc_weapon_ajax_long_spear.colourText: This long, weighty spear is the ideal weapon for the immensely strong and powerful "bulwark of the Achaeans".
troy_main_anc_weapon_ajax_long_spear.localisedColourText: 这把长而重的矛正适合强大无比的“亚该亚的堡垒”。
troy_main_anc_weapon_ajax_long_spear.effect: +7% to morale of spear units in Hero's army|-10% to recruitment cost of spear units
troy_main_anc_weapon_ajax_long_spear.localisedEffect: 英雄所在军队中持矛部队士气+7%|持矛部队征募花费-10%

troy_main_anc_mount_fighter_balanced_mel.colourText: This extremely-heavy chariot is best used for punching through battle lines while the Hero it bears uses their spear two-handed to cut the enemy down.
troy_main_anc_mount_fighter_balanced_mel.localisedColourText: 这辆极重的战车最适合冲锋陷阵，车上的英雄能够双手挥舞长矛斩杀敌人。

troy_main_anc_item_beast_drink_circe.colourText: This magical potion, brewed to perfection by Helios' daughter, somehow calms savage beasts that would otherwise maim and kill, including warlike men…
troy_main_anc_item_beast_drink_circe.localisedColourText: 这瓶魔药是赫利俄斯的女儿所调制的，能用来驯服吃人的恶兽，甚至是狂暴的战士……
troy_main_anc_item_beast_drink_circe.effect: +4 to charge of all units|-10% to morale of all enemy units
troy_main_anc_item_beast_drink_circe.localisedEffect: 所有部队冲锋+4|所有敌方部队士气-10%

troy_main_anc_mount_archer_skirmisher_bo.colourText: This large, slow chariot can carry a greater number of arrows for the Hero to fire at the enemy than is usual.
troy_main_anc_mount_archer_skirmisher_bo.localisedColourText: 这辆庞大、缓慢的战车能够为英雄提供更多的箭矢，供英雄向敌人射击。

troy_main_anc_mount_hec_hector_melee_spe.colourText: This medium-weight chariot enables the Hero to stay close to the fray whilst throwing their javelins at the foe.
troy_main_anc_mount_hec_hector_melee_spe.localisedColourText: 这辆中等重量的战车可载着英雄在近距离向敌人投掷标枪。

troy_main_anc_jason_gemstone.colourText: Sight of this dazzling jewel caused the Spartoi to fight amongst themselves for its possession instead of killing the enemy.
troy_main_anc_jason_gemstone.localisedColourText: 为了争夺这颗辉煌的宝石，地生人放弃与敌人作战而自相残杀。

troy_main_anc_item_amphion_lyre.colourText: Music can move mountains; at times, literally.
troy_main_anc_item_amphion_lyre.localisedColourText: 音乐能够撼动山峰：有时这不是一种比喻，而是确能发生的事。
troy_main_anc_item_amphion_lyre.effect: -2 to construction time in province capitals |-10% to wood construction costs
troy_main_anc_item_amphion_lyre.localisedEffect: 行省首府内建造时间-2 |木材建造花费-10%

troy_main_anc_item_cithaeronian_pelt.colourText: Appear to the enemy as the Cithaeronian lion; appear to them as Zeus' son.
troy_main_anc_item_cithaeronian_pelt.localisedColourText: 在敌人看来，是基塞龙山的狮子；而在他们看来，则是宙斯之子。
troy_main_anc_item_cithaeronian_pelt.effect: +5% to casualty replenishment rate of units in Hero's army| +2 to motivation
troy_main_anc_item_cithaeronian_pelt.localisedEffect: 英雄所在军队补员速率+5%|斗志+2

troy_main_anc_item_thracian_kithon.colourText: This linen or wool cloak, made from a single rectangle of cloth, is worn draped across the body and is fastened at the shoulder with a pin or clasp.
troy_main_anc_item_thracian_kithon.localisedColourText: 斗篷通常是由一整块亚麻布或羊毛制成，穿戴时垂下来遮盖住全身，并在肩膀处用别针或扣子固定。

troy_main_anc_mount_warlord_tactician_ja.colourText: This medium-weight chariot enables the Hero to stay close to the fray whilst throwing their javelins at the foe.
troy_main_anc_mount_warlord_tactician_ja.localisedColourText: 这辆中等重量的战车可载着英雄在近距离向敌人投掷标枪。

troy_main_anc_weapon_sceptre_agamemnon.colourText: Agamemnon's sceptre, the symbol of his power and authority, clears obstacles from the king's path.
troy_main_anc_weapon_sceptre_agamemnon.localisedColourText: 阿伽门农的权杖是他力量和权威的象征，他用这把权杖解决了通往国王道路上的障碍。
troy_main_anc_weapon_sceptre_agamemnon.effect: -10% to recruitment cost of all heavy infantry units|+5 to morale of all units in Hero's aura
troy_main_anc_weapon_sceptre_agamemnon.localisedEffect: 所有重装步兵部队征募花费-10%|英雄光环范围内所有部队士气+5

troy_main_anc_item_seal_mycenae.colourText: Sight of the Mycenaean royal crest inspires loyalty and a sense of protection amongst Agamemnon's subjects.
troy_main_anc_item_seal_mycenae.localisedColourText: 迈锡尼的王室标志可以激发阿伽门农臣民们的忠诚奉献和保家卫国的意识。
troy_main_anc_item_seal_mycenae.effect: -20% to construction cost of all military buildings|-2 to construction time of all main buildings
troy_main_anc_item_seal_mycenae.localisedEffect: 所有军事建筑建造成本-20%|所有核心建筑的建造时间-2

troy_main_anc_item_petasos_hat.colourText: Often worn in combination with a chlamys cape, this wide-brimmed Thessalian hat of straw, felt or leather is essential wear in the scorching midday sun on campaign.
troy_main_anc_item_petasos_hat.localisedColourText: 这种塞萨利宽边帽采用草、毡或皮革制成，常与披风搭配穿戴，很适合正午烈日下的战斗。
troy_main_anc_item_petasos_hat.effect: +3 to happiness in the local province| +2 to motivation

troy_main_anc_item_statue_athena.colourText: The wise goddess Athena helps man to make sensible decisions in the face of the chaos brought forth by the hand of her warlike brother Ares.
troy_main_anc_item_statue_athena.localisedColourText: 在人类面对好战的阿瑞斯所带来的混乱时，他的姐姐智慧女神雅典娜将帮助人们做出明智的决定。
troy_main_anc_item_statue_athena.effect: +7% to melee defence of spear units| +1 to motivation
troy_main_anc_item_statue_athena.localisedEffect: 持矛部队近战防御+7%|斗志+1

troy_main_anc_mount_paris_bow.colourText: This light chariot will keep the Hero mobile on the battlefield, but is still strong enough to be used as an archery platform.
troy_main_anc_mount_paris_bow.localisedColourText: 这辆轻型战车将使英雄在战场上保持机动性，并且也足够坚固，可以用作射箭平台。

troy_main_anc_weapon_procris_spear.colourText: It never misses and always returns to its bearer. You'll never leave a spear behind inside the foe again!
troy_main_anc_weapon_procris_spear.localisedColourText: 这支枪必定命中，并会回到它的持有者手中。你的长枪再也不会留在敌人身体里了！
troy_main_anc_weapon_procris_spear.effect: +8% to melee attack of all spear units|-10% to recruitment cost of spear units
troy_main_anc_weapon_procris_spear.localisedEffect: 所有矛兵部队近战攻击+8%|持矛部队征募花费-10%

troy_main_anc_item_dragon_teeth.colourText: Sown like seeds on the advice of Athena, from the teeth of the slain dragon the Spartoi grew.
troy_main_anc_item_dragon_teeth.localisedColourText: 在雅典娜的建议下，卡德摩斯将被他斩杀的巨龙的牙齿像种子一样播种下去，然后长出了一群地生人。
troy_main_anc_item_dragon_teeth.effect: -30% to recruitment cost of Spartoi|Favour of Ares: +3 per turn|+20% to melee attack of Spartoi units
troy_main_anc_item_dragon_teeth.localisedEffect: 地生人征募花费-30%|阿瑞斯的眷顾：每回合+3|地生人部队近战攻击+20%

troy_main_anc_item_bull_horn.colourText: "Blow that next to me again and I'll pan your head in, gottit?"
troy_main_anc_item_bull_horn.localisedColourText: “再在我旁边吹那玩意儿，我就把你的头敲扁，听明白没？”

troy_main_anc_item_aegeus_sandals.colourText: Wear these seemingly-humble sandals and you stand in the shoes of greatness.
troy_main_anc_item_aegeus_sandals.localisedColourText: 穿上这双看似有点简陋的凉鞋，你就能将伟大踩在脚下。
troy_main_anc_item_aegeus_sandals.effect: +5% to campaign movement range of Hero's army when on land| +2 to motivation
troy_main_anc_item_aegeus_sandals.localisedEffect: 英雄所在军队陆地战役地图移动距离+5%|斗志+2

troy_main_anc_mount_mountain_horses.colourText: Hardy, mountain breeds of horse have excellent stamina and a swiftness of charge that makes them the ideal vessel for bearing a spear-armed warrior to the fray.
troy_main_anc_mount_mountain_horses.localisedColourText: 这种吃苦耐劳的山地马耐力出色、速度惊人，是持矛勇士的首选坐骑。
troy_main_anc_mount_mountain_horses.effect: The Hero gains +8%  speed in battle while on a chariot
troy_main_anc_mount_mountain_horses.localisedEffect: 英雄乘坐战车时战斗移速+8%

troy_main_anc_mount_myc_agamemnon_javeli.colourText: This extremely-heavy chariot is best used for punching through battle lines while the Hero it bears uses their spear two-handed to cut the enemy down.
troy_main_anc_mount_myc_agamemnon_javeli.localisedColourText: 这辆极重的战车最适合冲锋陷阵，车上的英雄能够双手挥舞长矛斩杀敌人。

troy_main_anc_item_fishing_net.colourText: The effort expended in its construction saved much more when out on the water, and brought in a bumper catch.
troy_main_anc_item_fishing_net.localisedColourText: 修缝渔网固然劳时费力，出海捕鱼却因此事半功倍，渔获更是颇为喜人。

troy_adi_anc_weapon_salamian_sword.colourText: "Give me a great enough sword and I shall cleave the earth asunder."
troy_adi_anc_weapon_salamian_sword.localisedColourText: “给我一把足够锋利的宝剑，我能将大地劈开。”
troy_adi_anc_weapon_salamian_sword.effect: +70 to melee damage of Hero against sword units
troy_adi_anc_weapon_salamian_sword.localisedEffect: 英雄对剑兵部队造成的近战伤害+70

troy_main_anc_medea_ointment.colourText: Smeared upon skin and arms, this magical lotion protects the wearer from burning, as Jason was warded against the bulls' fiery breath.
troy_main_anc_medea_ointment.localisedColourText: 将这种神奇的乳液涂抹在皮肤和手臂上，能如伊阿宋承受神牛烈焰的鼻息一般，保护使用者不被灼伤。
troy_main_anc_medea_ointment.effect: +5% to this Hero's hitpoints|Grants fatigue reduction to the Hero
troy_main_anc_medea_ointment.localisedEffect: 该英雄生命值+5%|英雄获得疲劳减免

troy_main_anc_armour_aeetus_armour.colourText: Assuming you can bear the weight of this mighty armour, it will protect you from most kinds of harm.
troy_main_anc_armour_aeetus_armour.localisedColourText: 只要你能承受这套盔甲的重量，就能免受各种伤害。
troy_main_anc_armour_aeetus_armour.effect: +5 to armour of giant units in Hero's army|+10% to melee defence of giant units in Hero's army
troy_main_anc_armour_aeetus_armour.localisedEffect: 英雄所在军队中巨人部队护甲+5|英雄所在军队中巨人部队近战防御+10%

troy_main_anc_armour_hippomedon_shield.colourText: The fourth tribe leader's shield depicts a fire-breathing Typhon and shines like the sun, even in the dead of night.
troy_main_anc_armour_hippomedon_shield.localisedColourText: 第四位部落领袖的盾牌上画着喷出火焰的堤丰，就算在一片死寂的夜晚也会如太阳一般闪耀着光芒。
troy_main_anc_armour_hippomedon_shield.effect: +2 to motivation|+2 to armour of Hero

troy_main_anc_mount_warlord_utility_jave.colourText: This medium-weight chariot enables the Hero to stay close to the fray whilst throwing their javelins at the foe.
troy_main_anc_mount_warlord_utility_jave.localisedColourText: 这辆中等重量的战车可载着英雄在近距离向敌人投掷标枪。

troy_main_anc_item_seal_pylos.colourText: King Nestor's royal seal assures those seeking wise leadership that there is a righteous cause for which to fight.
troy_main_anc_item_seal_pylos.localisedColourText: 对那些寻求英明领导的人来说，涅斯托耳国王的王室印章将向他们保证为了正义的事业而战斗。
troy_main_anc_item_seal_pylos.effect: +20 to diplomatic relations with Achaeans|-20% construction cost of resource buildings|+50 to growth in the local province
troy_main_anc_item_seal_pylos.localisedEffect: 与亚该亚势力的外交关系+20|资源建筑建造成本-20%|该行省发展+50

troy_main_anc_armour_legendary_helmet.colourText: This fine helm was worn by a great warrior of legend, and has been passed down through the years of campaigning to its current, worthy owner.
troy_main_anc_armour_legendary_helmet.localisedColourText: 这顶头盔原本属于一位传说中的伟大战士，数年来由于战争而几经易手，如今终于落到这位配得上它的英雄手中。
troy_main_anc_armour_legendary_helmet.effect: +4 to motivation|+6 to armour of Hero

troy_main_anc_item_medusa_head.colourText: "You can tell exactly where I've been by the trail of marble guards."
troy_main_anc_item_medusa_head.localisedColourText: “循着那些石化的卫兵，你便能找到我的所在。”
troy_main_anc_item_medusa_head.effect: -15% to cost of all agent actions

troy_main_anc_item_apple_discord.localisedEffect: 阿佛洛狄忒的眷顾：每回合+1

troy_main_anc_item_ino_veil.localisedOnscreenName: 伊诺·莱奥科西亚的面纱
troy_main_anc_item_ino_veil.colourText: The sea-goddess' cape saved Odysseus from drowning as he floundered at sea and will do the same for others.
troy_main_anc_item_ino_veil.localisedColourText: 当奥德修斯在海上苦苦挣扎时，海洋女神的斗篷拯救了他，她也会帮助所有在海上遇难的人。
troy_main_anc_item_ino_veil.effect: -15% to attrition in deep sea waters

troy_dlc1_anc_mount_pen_hero_fighter_kil.colourText: This extremely-heavy chariot is best used for punching through battle lines while the Hero it bears uses their spear two-handed to cut the enemy down.
troy_dlc1_anc_mount_pen_hero_fighter_kil.localisedColourText: 这辆极重的战车最适合冲锋陷阵，车上的英雄能够双手挥舞长矛斩杀敌人。

troy_main_anc_mount_pht_achilles_melee.colourText: This most sturdy, well-made heavy chariot is capable of bearing the Hero into combat and breaking through the toughest frontline with relative ease.
troy_main_anc_mount_pht_achilles_melee.localisedColourText: 这辆制作精良的重型战车坚固无比，能够载着英雄进入战斗，并轻易突破最稳固的阵线。

troy_main_anc_item_celestial_iron_flute.colourText: Music makes for a quiet mind - inner calm is essential when battle is about to be joined.
troy_main_anc_item_celestial_iron_flute.localisedColourText: 音乐能令人思绪平静——当战斗迫在眉睫，保持内心的镇静至关重要。
troy_main_anc_item_celestial_iron_flute.effect: +5% to morale of own units| +1 to motivation

troy_main_anc_item_prometheus_ring.colourText: Following his release by Heracles, the Titan Prometheus fashioned this ring, enammelled with black rock from the Caucasian mountains that were once his prison.
troy_main_anc_item_prometheus_ring.localisedColourText: 泰坦普罗米修斯被赫拉克勒斯释放后，用曾经囚禁他的高加索山脉黑岩石制作了这个戒指。

troy_main_anc_weapon_bellerophon_bow.colourText: Wield this bow and your quarry will be like the Chimera, with you the dogged hunter forever at its heels.
troy_main_anc_weapon_bellerophon_bow.localisedColourText: 挥动这张弓，你的猎物就将如同客迈拉，你永远都能追猎到它。
troy_main_anc_weapon_bellerophon_bow.effect: +2 to motivation|+10% to range of missile units in Hero's army
troy_main_anc_weapon_bellerophon_bow.localisedEffect: 斗志+2|英雄所在军队中远程部队射程+10%

troy_main_anc_weapon_arethous_club.colourText: A brutally-effective cudgel, assuming of course you have the necessary space to swing it...
troy_main_anc_weapon_arethous_club.localisedColourText: 这根棒子威力无匹，但前提是你要有挥舞它的空间……
troy_main_anc_weapon_arethous_club.effect: +2 to motivation|+50 to melee damage of Hero

troy_adi_anc_armour_salamian_armour.colourText: "A warrior clad in bright shining bronze is but a man yet to be tested."
troy_adi_anc_armour_salamian_armour.localisedColourText: “穿着闪亮的青铜铠甲的战士仍是个未经考验的人。”

troy_main_anc_armour_reinforced_shield.colourText: "He got his spear stuck in it. That was the end of him once I got my blade around."
troy_main_anc_armour_reinforced_shield.localisedColourText: “他的矛卡在了上面，而我拔出剑杀了他。”

troy_dlc1_anc_mount_hip_hero_skirmisher_.colourText: This speedy horse will get its rider close enough to the enemy to loose their arrows and then quickly back out of range again.
troy_dlc1_anc_mount_hip_hero_skirmisher_.localisedColourText: 这匹快马可以载着骑手快速接近敌人，然后在挽弓放箭后快速拉开距离。

troy_main_anc_mount_fighter_disruptor_ja.colourText: This most sturdy, well-made heavy chariot is capable of bearing the Hero into combat and breaking through the toughest frontline with relative ease.
troy_main_anc_mount_fighter_disruptor_ja.localisedColourText: 这辆制作精良的重型战车坚固无比，能够载着英雄进入战斗，并轻易突破最稳固的阵线。

troy_main_anc_weapon_short_iron_dory.colourText: This short, one-handed wooden spear eschews bronze in favour of a new, stronger, iron tip, which can break through linen, leather or bronze with relative ease.
troy_main_anc_weapon_short_iron_dory.localisedColourText: 这种短的单手木杆长矛没有使用青铜作为矛头，而是创造性地使用更坚固的铁制矛头，它可以轻松地刺穿亚麻布、皮革或青铜。
troy_main_anc_weapon_short_iron_dory.effect: +6% to melee attack of all spear units
troy_main_anc_weapon_short_iron_dory.localisedEffect: 所有矛兵部队近战攻击+6%

troy_main_anc_mount_hec_hector_melee_spe.colourText: This extremely-heavy chariot is best used for punching through battle lines while the Hero it bears uses their spear two-handed to cut the enemy down.
troy_main_anc_mount_hec_hector_melee_spe.localisedColourText: 这辆极重的战车最适合冲锋陷阵，车上的英雄能够双手挥舞长矛斩杀敌人。

troy_main_anc_item_golden_mirror.colourText: "Mirror, mirror in my hand, who is the greatest warrior in the land?"
troy_main_anc_item_golden_mirror.localisedColourText: “魔镜魔镜告诉我，谁是世界上最伟大的战士？”
troy_main_anc_item_golden_mirror.effect: +2 to motivation|+10 to morale of Hero

troy_main_anc_mount_fighter_killer_melee.colourText: This medium-weight chariot enables the Hero to stay close to the fray whilst throwing their javelins at the foe.
troy_main_anc_mount_fighter_killer_melee.localisedColourText: 这辆中等重量的战车可载着英雄在近距离向敌人投掷标枪。

troy_dlc1_anc_mount_hip_hero_trickster_a.colourText: This mighty charger, specifically bred for war, is large enough to enable the Hero to shoot with greater range than the average horse.
troy_dlc1_anc_mount_hip_hero_trickster_a.localisedColourText: 这匹强大的战马专为战争而饲养，它体型庞大，可以让英雄在比平时更远的距离进行射击。

troy_main_anc_item_pelasgian_kithon.colourText: This linen or wool cloak, made from a single rectangle of cloth, is worn draped across the body and is fastened at the shoulder with a pin or clasp.
troy_main_anc_item_pelasgian_kithon.localisedColourText: 斗篷通常是由一整块亚麻布或羊毛制成，穿戴时垂下来遮盖住全身，并在肩膀处用别针或扣子固定。

troy_dlc1_anc_mount_pen_hero_warlord_tac.colourText: This fast mount is suitable for bearing a skirmisher within range and then expeditiously back to a safe distance.
troy_dlc1_anc_mount_pen_hero_warlord_tac.localisedColourText: 这匹坐骑速度飞快，可以带着突袭者迅速地撤退到安全距离。

troy_main_anc_armour_sarpedon_shield.colourText: This large, circular shield made from closely-folded, golden-stitched oxhide is big enough for a man to safely crouch behind.
troy_main_anc_armour_sarpedon_shield.localisedColourText: 这面大圆盾由紧密折叠的牛皮制成，饰以金边，它的体积足以让一个人安全地躲在它后面。
troy_main_anc_armour_sarpedon_shield.effect: +4 to melee defence of Hero|+8% to morale for mythic, mounted and chariot units
troy_main_anc_armour_sarpedon_shield.localisedEffect: 英雄近战防御+4|神话、骑乘及战车部队士气+8%

troy_main_anc_master_charioteer.colourText: A steady hand and a willingness to ride through rocks, fire or bodies. What else is there?
troy_main_anc_master_charioteer.localisedColourText: 有了沉稳的双手和甘愿赴汤蹈火的意志，那还需要什么呢？
troy_main_anc_master_charioteer.effect: The Hero gains +10%  speed in battle while on a chariot
troy_main_anc_master_charioteer.localisedEffect: 英雄乘坐战车时战斗移速+10%

troy_main_anc_item_silver_lamp.colourText: "Light a candle to see me through these times."
troy_main_anc_item_silver_lamp.localisedColourText: “悠悠地点上最亮的蜡烛台，让它陪我度过这时代。”
troy_main_anc_item_silver_lamp.effect: +20% to line of sight on campaign map

troy_main_anc_item_bellerophont_bridle.colourText: Gifted to the famed monster-slayer by Athena herself, this bridle enabled Bellerophon to tame the mythical Pegasus.
troy_main_anc_item_bellerophont_bridle.localisedColourText: 雅典娜亲手将这条缰绳赠给了著名的英雄柏勒洛丰，让他能够驯服天马珀伽索斯。
troy_main_anc_item_bellerophont_bridle.effect: +10% to battle speed for cavalry units|+10% to battle speed of chariot units|The Hero gains +15%  speed in battle while on a chariot
troy_main_anc_item_bellerophont_bridle.localisedEffect: 骑兵部队战斗移速+10%|战车部队战斗移速+10%|英雄乘坐战车时战斗移速+15%

troy_main_anc_weapon_pandarus_bow.colourText: The highly-skilled archer Pandarus carries a bow hewn from a giant goat horn and strung with gold thread.
troy_main_anc_weapon_pandarus_bow.localisedColourText: 技艺高超的射手潘达洛斯所持的弓，以巨大的山羊角辅以金线制成。
troy_main_anc_weapon_pandarus_bow.effect: +16% to missile damage of own missile units|-10% to recruitment cost of missile units
troy_main_anc_weapon_pandarus_bow.localisedEffect: 己方远程部队的远程伤害+16%|远程部队征募花费-10%

troy_dlc1_anc_mount_pen_penthesilea_hors.colourText: This hardy breed are not easily unnerved on the battlefield, even deep among the densest, most violent melee.
troy_dlc1_anc_mount_pen_penthesilea_hors.localisedColourText: 这匹顽强的马即使身处最危险、最残忍的战斗中，也不会轻易退缩。

troy_main_anc_weapon_periphetes_club.colourText: Unlike its one-eyed former owner did, use this bronze bludgeon only for just purposes.
troy_main_anc_weapon_periphetes_club.localisedColourText: 别学它的独眼前主人，把这根青铜棒用在正当的目的上。
troy_main_anc_weapon_periphetes_club.effect: Increases the charge of units by +15% when ambushing|+70 to melee damage of Hero
troy_main_anc_weapon_periphetes_club.localisedEffect: 伏击时部队冲锋增加+15%|英雄近战杀伤+70

troy_dlc1_anc_mount_hip_hero_warlord_tac.colourText: This large, sturdy, yet swift beast is capable of carrying extra javelins for its skirmishing rider to hurl at the enemy.
troy_dlc1_anc_mount_hip_hero_warlord_tac.localisedColourText: 这只庞大、健壮而又敏捷的猛兽可以携带额外的标枪，供它背上的骑手向敌人投掷。

troy_main_anc_item_seal_ephesos.colourText: "A fish and a boar will show you the way."
troy_main_anc_item_seal_ephesos.localisedColourText: “鱼和猪的标志将引领你前进。”
troy_main_anc_item_seal_ephesos.effect: +40 to diplomatic relations with Achaeans|-25% to recruitment cost of all agents
troy_main_anc_item_seal_ephesos.localisedEffect: 与亚该亚势力的外交关系+40|所有事务官征募花费-25%

troy_adi_anc_armour_salamian_sandals.colourText: "The earth groaned with each trampling step of the giant's sandaled feet."
troy_adi_anc_armour_salamian_sandals.localisedColourText: “巨人穿着凉鞋的脚重重地踏在地上，大地发出了呻吟。”
troy_adi_anc_armour_salamian_sandals.effect: +5 to melee defence of Hero|+10% to battle speed of Hero
troy_adi_anc_armour_salamian_sandals.localisedEffect: 英雄近战防御+5|英雄战斗移速+10%

troy_main_anc_mount_mares_diomedes_thrac.localisedOnscreenName: 狄俄墨德斯的色雷斯母马
troy_main_anc_mount_mares_diomedes_thrac.colourText: The trouble with beginning a diet of human flesh is that one gets something of a taste for it… or so we are reliably informed!
troy_main_anc_mount_mares_diomedes_thrac.localisedColourText: 吃人肉最大的问题就在于，有些人可能会吃上瘾……我们是这样听说的！
troy_main_anc_mount_mares_diomedes_thrac.effect: The Hero gains +12%  speed in battle while on a chariot
troy_main_anc_mount_mares_diomedes_thrac.localisedEffect: 英雄乘坐战车时战斗移速+12%
